La actividad que realiza Candy es la confección de ropa de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños, para luego venderlo entre sus amistades, familiares y conocidos, teniendo muy buena aceptación por sus buenos acabados. Comenta que este oficio lo aprendió estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional, e iniciándose como independiente hace 6 años con una maquina de coser que compró con su propio capital, logrando crecer con el paso del tiempo. Ahora cuenta con la colaboración de una ayudante a la que paga por prenda confeccionada. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es realizar el oficio que le gusta, ya que le agrada mucho confeccionar nuevos diseños. Sin embargo, el cansancio físico que le ocasiona estar varias horas en una misma postura realizando los cortes y costuras le perjudica  pero a pesar de eso tiene planes de ampliar y hacer crecer su negocio, queriendo abrir un taller en su casa comprando más maquinas de costura. Este será el préstamo número 6 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida por la oportunidad de tener una línea de crédito para avanzar con su negocio, por eso se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores. Además de sentirse cómoda con el grupo de su banco comunal pues los considera bunas personas.
Con el monto solicitado de 3000 nuevos soles, comprara una nueva maquina de coser a un valor de 600 nuevos soles, además de comprar materiales para confección de ropas, como telas e hilos.
texts.en:
Candy, age 27, is a hardworking and earnest woman who exhibits cheerfulness through her extroverted personality. She is in a common-law relationship and lives with her partner Guillermo and her 14-year-old sister, who she is supporting by providing for her education. Candy lives in her own home and she has no children. She produces clothing for women, men, and children and then sells these items to relatives, friends, and acquaintances. Her designs have received good reception because they have fine finishes. Candy says that she learned this trade by studying at a vocational center and then became independent six years ago when she purchased a sewing machine with her own capital. Her business has grown since that time. Now she works with an assistant who she pays for each garment she produces. Candy enjoys her business because she has the ability to produce new designs. However, she occasionally suffers from physical exertion as a result of cutting and sewing for several hours in the same position. Despite the pain, she has plans to expand and grow her business. Candy wants to open a workshop in her house by purchasing more sewing machines.

This will be her sixth loan with the MFP organization. She is grateful for the opportunity to have a line of credit to help advance her business. For this reason, Candy promises to complete her payments just as she did with her previous loans. In addition, she feels comfortable with her Communal Bank group because she considers the members to be good people. The amount of 3000 PEN that she requested will be used to buy a new sewing machine valued at 600 PEN, as well as sewing materials for making clothes, such as fabrics and thread.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, fabrics, and thread.

loans.name: Cori

texts.es: Cori, de 37 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de alegre y solidaria, es conviviente con Juiber, fruto de esa feliz unión tiene tres hermosos hijos de 20, 18  y 14 años de edad, habitando cómodamente una casa que es de su propiedad. La actividad que realiza Cori es la venta de comidas tales como tallarines, pollos fritos, Juanes, arroz chaufa y otros, para eso instala su mesa en el frontis de su casa todos los días por las noches hace 14 años, en donde atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus propios vecinos y amistades, llegando a acabar todo lo que prepara, contando con la ayuda de su hermana en la preparación y atención a los clientes, pagándole  por día trabajado. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que le permite distraerse y estar ocupada, además de gustarle mucho el oficio de cocinar que aprendió de su madre, logrando tener una regular clientela y le deja buenas ganancias. Por lo contrario, lo que no le gusta de su actividad es cuando llueve dificulta un poco la venta, pero no se desanima,  por eso tiene planes de ampliar y mejorar su negocio, deseando abrir un restaurante en su propia casa. Este será el préstamo 4 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para poder cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete a ser puntal con el pago de sus cuotas, como en créditos anteriores, para así tener un buen record crediticio. Está cómoda con su grupo, pues los considera buenas personas. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, desea comprar una cocina nueva, y utensilios platos, tazas.
texts.en:
Cori, age 37, is a hardworking and earnest woman.  She is also a cheerful and supportive individual.  Cori is in a happy common-law relationship with Juiber and they have three beautiful children (ages 20, 18, and 14).  They live comfortably in their own home.  Cori sells food such as noodles, fried chicken, “juanes” (chicken and rice wrapped in banana leaves), fried rice, and other dishes.  She has a table set up in front of her house where she has been selling in the evenings every day of the week for the past 14 years.  Cori provides friendly service to her customers, most of whom are neighbors and friends.  They come to buy everything she prepares.  Her sister helps with preparing food and attending to the customers.  She is paid every day she works.  Cori enjoys her business because it provides a distraction and keeps her busy.  In addition, she likes to cook because she learned this skill for her mother.  She has accumulated regular customers and earns a good income.  On the other hand, she dislikes operating her business when it rains because she generates few sales.  This does not discourage her and she has plans to expand and improve her business.  She wants to open a restaurant in her home.

This will be her fourth loan with the MFP organization.  She hopes that this small loan will enable her to complete her goals.  In addition, Cori promises to be punctual with her payments just like she did with her previous loans.  She has a good credit record.  Cori is comfortable with her group because she considers the members to be good people.  The amount of 1000 PEN that she is requesting will be used to buy a new stove, utensils, plates, and cups.

loans.use: to buy a new stove, utensils, plates, and cups.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, de 44 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y alegre, es conviviente con Liborio, fruto de esa unión tienen cuatro hijos de 25, 23 21 y 18 años de edad, habitando todos juntos una casa que es de su propiedad. El negocio de Rosa consiste en la venta de bebidas gaseosas que realiza en su propia casa, para eso cuenta con una refrigeradora donde guarda sus productos a temperaturas frías como les agrada a sus clientes, por el clima caluroso de la zona, iniciándose con un capital propio y además que ya contaba con la refrigeradora, se animo a iniciar su negocio, hace 4 años, contando con la ayuda de sus hijos en la atención de los clientes cuando ella está fuera de casa. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es el contar con un ingreso económico con el cual apoyar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar, ya que con el sueldo de vigilante de su pareja no les alcanzaba, logrando aumentar su capital y reinvirtiendo en su negocio, a logrado crecer el volumen y variedad del stock  de sus productos. Por lo contario, comenta que no le gusta cuando llueve muy seguido pues eso hace disminuir sus ventas por esos días, pero eso no la desanima, pues sabe que es algo de la naturaleza, y tiene planes de hacer crecer su negocio, queriendo abrir un fuente de soda en su casa.  Este será el préstamo número 3 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en préstamos anteriores. Además se siente cómoda con su banco comunal, pues considera  a sus miembros ser personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de gaseosas en mayor cantidad y a menor precio, para así obtener mayores márgenes de ganancias.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 44, is a hardworking and cheerful woman. She is in a common-law relationship with Liborio and they have four children (ages 25, 23, 21, and 18). They all live together in their own home. Rosa’s business involves selling soft drinks from her home. She has a refrigerator where she keeps her products cold for her customers since the weather in the area is warm. Four years ago, Rosa started this business with her own capital and already owned a refrigerator. She was excited about getting this venture off the ground. Her children help with attending to the customers whenever she is not at home. Rosa enjoys this business because she is able to generate an income so that she can help her partner with the household expenses. He does not earn enough money from his salary as a security guard.

Rosa has been able to increase her capital and reinvest in her business, which has grown in volume and in the variety of products available. On the other hand, she dislikes the rain because her sales diminish on those particular days. However, she does not get discouraged because she knows that it is a part of nature. Rosa has plans to grow her business by opening a soda fountain in her house.

This will be her third loan with the MFP organization. Rosa hopes that this small loan will enable her to complete her objectives. In addition, she promises to complete her payments just like she did with her previous loans. Rosa feels comfortable with her Communal Bank because she considers the members to be responsible and supportive people. The amount of 1500 PEN that she requested will be invested in the purchase of soft drinks in bulk so that she can get a lower price. This will enable her to have a larger profit margin.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks in bulk.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: La señora Margarita es muy tímida pero destaca por ser muy trabajadora, desde muy niña tuvo problemas en su familia casi siempre tenia que arreglarse trabajando de lo que podia, cuando se junto con el padre de sus hijos la situacion tampoco cambio, con el pasar del tiempo su pareja la dejo con sus hijos y ella acostumbrada al trabajo emprendio en el comercio de las verduras,  empezó deambulando con la venta de algunas verduras en especial la papa y fue conociendo lugares donde podía acomodar sus productos y así se aprovisiono poco a poco de mas verduras y consiguió un puesto en el mercado campesino en Chimoré donde actualmente vive y tiene asegurada su actividad, siempre esta en constante movimiento ya que la venta de verduras a la que se dedica así lo requiere, cotiza precios, busca proveedores mas accesibles, se relaciona con sus contactos en espera de novedades de aprovisionamiento, etc., Siendo una persona sola y con el mantenimiento de 3 hijos la cliente requiere de invertir mas en cada semana de su actividad. En consecuencia el crédito que solicita le servirá para poder viabilizar un incremento en su capital de operación lo que en el tiempo le significara mayor rédito en sus ingresos. La señora Margarita tiene como metas que sus hijos no pasen lo que ella tuvo que afrontar por lo que siempre su trabajo esta orientado a mejorar su calidad de vida y con el presente credito en algo se apaliaran sus requerimientos y hara rotar mas su mercaderia, mejorando de esta manera su actividad.
texts.en:
Margarita is very shy but very hardworking.  She’s had family problems since she was a little girl and always had to work however she could.  Things didn’t change when she got together with her children’s father.  After a while he left her with her children and since she’s accustomed to working, started selling vegetables.  She began selling some vegetables on foot, especially potatoes, and learned of places where she could set up her vegetables.  Little by little she began selling more vegetables and acquired a stall at the country market in Chimoré, where she currently lives and does business.

She’s always in motion, since her vegetable selling business demands it.  She negotiates prices, looks for more accessible suppliers, and makes contacts in hopes of new advantages, etc.

Having the sole responsibility for supporting her children requires her to invest more into her business each week.  This loan will provide additional working capital that will eventually result in increased income.  Margarita’s goal is for her children not to have to deal with the challenges she had to face and her work is always focused on providing them a better quality of life.  This loan will help and allow her to rotate more merchandise and in this way improve her business.

loans.use: to provide working capital.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
Rene tiene 48 años de edad, es una persona trabajadora. Él vive en la provincia Quillacollo del departamento de Cochabamba, genera ingresos para sostener a su familia, vendiendo leche cruda de vaca a los vecinos de su zona y su esposa es quien elabora y vende los deliciosos chorizos paceños.
Rene  vive  con su familia, tiene a su cuidado 4 hijos, necesita el préstamo para comprar forraje para su ganado vacuno y haga frente a la escases de alimento que existe en su localidad y así pueda seguir alimentando a su ganado hasta que la situación mejore. 
Rene entre sus planes futuros planea sacar un nuevo préstamo edificar establos.
texts.en:
Rene is 48 years old and a hard-working person.  He lives in Quillacollo province, in Cochabamba department.  He makes income to support his family by selling raw cows' milk to his neighbors.  His wife makes and sells delicious La Paz chorizo.

Rene lives with his family and has four children in his care.  He needs this loan to buy fodder for his cows and thereby deal with the problem of a scarcity of feed that exists in his town.  This will enable him to continue feeding his cows until the situation improves.

Rene's future plans include taking out another loan to build some stables.

loans.use: to buy fodder for his cows

loans.name: Maria Nicolasa

texts.es:
María tiene 42 años, es conviviente y reside con su familia en casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Paiján, perteneciente a la Región La Libertad, ubicada a 4 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque.  

María se dedica desde hace 10 años a la venta de leche, a sus vecinos y clientela quien por la calidad del producto siempre la escogen.  Para esta actividad posee 6 vacas productoras de leche.  Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad le permiten cubrir sus gastos personales y los de su familia.

María desea vender mayores volúmenes de leche, es por ello que desea comprar más alimento para su ganado, ya que al estar mejor alimentadas producirán más leche.  Ante ello, María ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
María is 42 years old.  She lives with her partner and family in her own home which is located in Paiján district, in La Libertad province, 4 hours from the city of Chiclayo (the capital of Lambayeque department).

María has been selling milk for 10 years.  She sells to her neighbors and customers who always buy from her because of the good quality of her product.  María has 6 milk-producing cows.  The income that she makes from this business allow her to cover her personal expenses as well as those of her family.

María would like to sell larger volumes of milk and so she would like to buy more feed for her cattle because, if they are better fed, they will produce more milk.  For this reason, María is requesting a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally-balanced feed for her cows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise for her cosmetics and perfume business.

loans.name: Nilda Zenobia

texts.es: La señora Nilda, tiene 56 años D. edad, la señora es D. origen humilD., ella tiene 4 hijos D. los cuales 2 ya son casados y viven en otra ciudad, ella solo mantiene a dos D. sus hijos que aun son menores D. edad. Doña Nilda tiene casita propia el cual le heredo su papa y esta esta ubicada en la zona central D. la localidad Sacaba, la Sra. Nilda se dedica al comercio D. comida desD. hace mas D. 10 años, Ella venD. comida D. miércoles a lunes, tomándose así un día D. descanso, esto porque los días martes es vacío y no hay venta. El préstamo lo invertirá en compra D. insumos para la elaboración D. comidas como arroz, fideo, aceite, papa, la sra. Nilda es un apersona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Nilda is 56 years old and of humble origin.  She has four children, two of whom are already married and live in another city.  She only supports two of her children who are still young.  Nilda owns her own small house which her father gave her as an inheritance.  It is located in the central area of the town of Sacaba.  Nilda has been selling food for more than 10 years.  She sells her food from Wednesday to Monday, taking one rest day.  This is because Tuesdays are not busy and there are no sales to be maD.. 

Nilda will invest her loan in buying supplies for making her food such as rice, noodles, oil and potatoes.  Nilda is a very hard-working person and she feels happy for the support she is being given.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making food

loans.name: Rocio Del Pilar

texts.es:
Rocio tiene 23 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a sus padres y a sus hermanos en una zona marginal del distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola ubicada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace más de tres años a la comercialización de productos de belleza y cosméticos por catálogo. Ella cuenta con un grupo de clientes que acuden con frecuencia a solicitarle los productos que ofrece, usualmente trabaja en base a pedidos, aunque también cuenta con un stock propio que utiliza cada vez que un cliente tiene urgencia de los productos que ofrece.

Paralelamente se dedica a trabajar en una peluquería de la zona, ya que ha estudiado cosmetología.

Rocío ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que planea utilizar en la compra de más mercadería para aumentar su negocio y poder recibir mejores ganancias.

Ella es una cliente que ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa y que ha demostrado puntualidad, responsabilidad y honradez al momento de asumir sus pagos.
texts.en:
Rocio is 23 years old. She is single and lives alongside her parents and her brothers in a suburb of Tambogrande, an agricultural area located in the Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo.

For more than three years, she has been dedicated to selling beauty products and cosmetics from catalogs. She has a group of customers who go to her frequently to request the products she offers. She usually works based on orders although she also has her own stock that she uses every time a customer needs a product she offers urgently.

At the same time, she is dedicated to working in a salon in the area since she has studied cosmetology.

Rocio has requested from Edpyme Alternativa a lon of 1,000 "soles" that she plans to use in the purchase of more merchandise to expand her business and to be able to receive greater earnings.

She is a client who has already had loans with Edpyme Alternativa and who has demonstrated punctuality, responsibility and honor at the time of completing her payments.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to expand her sales business

loans.name: Nadia Georget

texts.es:
Nadia tiene 20 años de edad vive en la zona central de la ciudad de La Paz , ella es soltera y vive con su mama y con su hermana menor.
Nadia es una persona que comenzó a trabajar a temprana edad en el rubro del comercio de venta de ropa y articulos de belleza femenina, actualmente estudia en la Universidad Estatal la carrera de Psicología, para poder salir adelante y poder trabajar en la vida con un título el cual le generara mayores ingresos. 
Ella se dedica  a trabajar y estudiar para poder ayudar en casa a los gastos familiares, el crédito es para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería para el negocio ya que esta época es alta en ventas  y ella tiene mucha experiencia en esto.
El Objetivo, el sueño fundamental de Nadia es tener un negocio prospero con local propio en un futuro y asi poder vivir bien y que mejoren las condiciones de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Nadia is 20 years old and lives in the central area of the city of La Paz.  She is single and lives with her mom and younger sister.

Nadia is a person who started working at an young age, selling clothes and ladies' beauty products.  She is currently studying psychology at the State University so that she can get ahead in life and work with a degree which will make her more money.

Nadia works and studies so that she can help her household with the family expenses.  She will use this loan to buy a larger quantity of merchandise for her business as this is a time of year when she makes good sales and she has a lot of experience.

Nadia's biggest dream for the future is to have a prosperous business, located in her own premises, so that she can live comfortably and improve her own living conditions, as well as those of her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her clothing business

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
Raquel tiene 30 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive junto a sus padres en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola especializada en la producción de mango y limón, se encuentra ubicada en la región de Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Raquel se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, en un establecimiento ubicado en la casa de sus padres, el negocio es atendido por las mañanas por su mama y por ella en las tardes, durante todos los días de la semana. El negocio les sirve para ayudar a sostener los gastos familiares y para abastecer a sus vecinos de productos básicos de consumo diario.

Adicionalmente se dedica a trabajar en una escuela de la zona, con lo que obtiene ingresos adicionales para ayudar a sus padres con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia, que también se sostiene de la agricultura, actividad que les brinda ingresos esporádicos.

Raquel ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles  que le permitan adquirir productos de primera necesidad con los cuales pueda ampliar su negocio y seguir colaborando con la economía de su familia. Ella es una cliente nueva para Edpyme Alternativa y goza de buenas referencias entre las personas que le conocen.
texts.en:
Raquel is 30 years old. She is single and does not have children. She lives alongside her parents in the district of Tambogrande, a farming area specializing in the production of mang and lemon. It is located in the region of Piura, more that four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

Raquel is dedicated to selling groceries in an establishment located in her parents' house. The business at attended in the mornings by her mother and in the afternoons, by her, every day of the week. The business serves to help her support the family and to supply her neighbors with basic products of daily consumption.

Additionally, she is dedicated to working in a school in the area from which she obtains additional income to help her parents support the family who also is supported by farming, an activity that provides them with sporadic income.

Raquel has requested from Edpyme Alternativa a loan of 1,000 "soles" that allows her to acquire staples with which she can expand her business and continue supporting her family. She is a new client of Edpyme Alternativa and enjoys good references among people who know her.

loans.use: to acquire staples with which she can expand her business.

loans.name: Jeanette Yadira

texts.es:
Jeanette, de 45 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad de Estelí,  madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos de los cuales dos de ellos son independientes y los otros dos viven con ella están estudiando. Inicio su negocio con capital proprio hace 20 años cuando trabajaba par una empresa privada pero enfermo de los huesos y tuvo que dejar de trabajar  por las constantes tratamientos a los que fue sometida, esto no fue obstaculo para buscar como salir adelante no podía dejar a sus hijos solos así que con la pensión que le pasaron ella puso su pulpería para que generara ingresos y sus hijos tuvieran lo necesario para vivir. 
Ella requiere el préstamo comprar ropa, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, detergentes, jabón, papel higiénico, Juguetes. Con esta inversión podrá tener surtido su pulpería  de nuevos y mejores productos de mucha necesidad en su vecindario. Una de sus metas es terminar de preparar a sus hijos y comprar material construcción para mejorar las condiciones de su casa y su negocio.
texts.en:
Jeanette is 45 years old and a resident of the city of Estelí. She is a single mother with four children, two of whom are independent while the other two live with her and are studying. Jeanette started her business when she was 20 years old, using her own capital that she earned while working for a private company. However, she developed a bone disease and was not able to continue working because of the constant treatments that she had to endure. This did not prevent her from moving forward since she could not support her children with only her pension. She opened a store so that she could generate income and provide what was necessary in order for her children to live.

Jeanette is requesting a loan in order to buy clothing, sugar, rice, beans, detergents, soap, toilet paper, and toys. With this investment, she will be able to restock her store with new and better products that have great need in her neighborhood. One of her goals is to finish raising her children and buy construction materials in order to improve the conditions in her home and in her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing, sugar, rice, beans, detergents, soap, toilet paper, and toys.

loans.name: Santos Manuel

texts.es:
Santos tiene 26 años de edad y reside junto a su familia en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, en el caserío CP-2 Colera, la zona es una región agrícola que produce principalmente mango y limón. Su vivienda aún no cuenta con servicios básicos como agua y luz.

Santos se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como ovinos, teniendo actualmente 10 ovejas, las cuales cría y engorda para luego sacrificarlas y vender su carme o también comercializarlas en mercado local. También cuenta con 0.5 hectáreas de terreno agrícola, herencia de su padre, en el cual tiene sembrado limón que cosecha semanalmente. Su esposa lo apoya en todas sus actividades que realiza.

Santos se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de ovinos y compra de fertilizantes para abonamiento de su cultivo de limón,  esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo  y así mejorar su calidad de vida.

El es un cliente nuevo para nuestra empresa, en la zona donde reside cuenta con muy buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos.
texts.en:
Santos is 26 years old and lives together with his family in the rural area of Tambogrande district, in the small village of CP-2 Colera.  This is an agricultural area which mainly produces mangoes and lemons.  Santos' home still does not receive basic services such as water and electricity.

Santos raises animals such as sheep.  He currently has 10 sheep which he raises, fattens and then either slaughters and sells their meat or sells them in the local market.  He also has half a hectare of farmland, which his father gave him as an inheritance, where he grows lemons that he harvests weekly.  His wife supports him in all his activities.

Santos is requesting a loan for 800 soles from Edpyme Alternativa which he plans to invest in buying nutritionally-balanced feed for fattening his sheep.  He will also buy fertilizers for his lemon crops.  This investment will allow him to continue growing and thereby improve his quality of life.

Santos is a new client for our company.  He has very good references from his neighbors.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally-balanced feed for fattening his livestock and to buy fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe is married with four children. Maria Fe is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines.
She is a farmer and raises pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years. She has requested a loan of 20,000 to purchase feeds and vitamins for her piglets.
Maria Fe has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Maria Fe hopes to save more for her family future .

loans.use: To purchase feeds and vitamins for her piglets

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:

Betty owns a retail store to earn a living and has had this business for two years. Each month, she earns 5000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for 3000 to purchase spices for her retail business.

Betty has been a member of PMPC for more than one year. In the future, Betty hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase spices for her retail business.

location.town: La Union, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Lubov

texts.ru:
Любовь замужем. У них с мужем двое детей. Дочь живет вместе с ними, а взрослый сын живет со своей семьей отдельно. Любовь имеет свой бизнес.

Любовь продает женскую одежду. У нее торговая точка на центральном рынке города. Торговая точка раположена удачно с большой проходимостью людей. Она имеет много положительных качеств такие как трудолюбие и ответственность, которые помогаю ей в бизнесе.

Любовь просит прдеставить ей кредит на сумму 20,000 гривен на закупку женских пальто и шуб к зимнему сезону. Она надеется получить дополнительную прибыль и потратить ее на улучшение жилищных условий для своей семьи.
texts.en:
Lubov is married. She and her husband have two children. Their daughter lives with them and their grown son lives separately with his family. Lubov has her own business. 

Lubov sells womens clothing. She has a stall in the city's central market. The stall is well situated in a heavily trafficked area. She has many positive characteristics such as diligence and responsibility that help her in business. 

Lubov is asking for a loan of 20,000 grivna for the purchase of ladies overcoats and fur coats for the coming winter season. She hopes to earn additional profits which can be spent on improving her family's living situation.

loans.use: to buy womens overcoats and fur coats for the winter season.

In the future, Arlen would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her snack-vending business

loans.name: Evelyn

She has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, she hopes to become a successful businesswoman.

loans.use: to purchase pigs to raise

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is 39 years old and lives in P-1 Agura Carangan, Ozamiz City. She is married with three children.

In the future, Aida would like to be successful in her chosen business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for viands and snacks of her restaurant

In the future, Lina hopes to have a lot of capital in order to help their daily needs. Lina is a MIGS member of PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase different kinds of fruit for her fruit-vending business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase groceries for sale

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica is married with 3 children. Jessica is 38 years old and lives in Mansabay Bajo, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental.

Jessica sells a variety of snacks to earn a living and has had this business for two years. She has requested a loan of 12,000 PHP to purchase flour, sugar, milk, bananas and other ingredients for her snack-vending business. Jessica has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. 

In the future, Jessica hopes to have more savings for additional capitalization for her other future business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like a sack flour, sugar, milk, and bananas for her snack-vending business

location.town: Mansabay Bajo Lopez Jaena Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Antonio

loans.name: Sauda

texts.en:

In the future, Sauda hopes to have a mini-grocery store in the area.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Imani Shg Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Imani SHG Group in Western Kenya! This group joined Kiva partner One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.
Eunice is the facilitator of the Imani SHG group. She takes care of four children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Eunice had an excellent maize yield harvesting fifteen bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Eunice was only able to harvest six bags of maize on one acre of land.
With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Eunice and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit, and insurance.
With income from maize sales, Eunice will educate her children and invest in livestock rearing. In 2012, the members of Imani SHG Group will each plant  between half and one acre of maize.
The photograph shows Eunice and her group with the field officer on the far left.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Maturu Hill Group

texts.en:

Rodah takes care of nine children at home. She joined One Acre Fund due to One Acre Fund’s best prices and in order to ensure food security for her family and later educate her children. In the recent 2011 season, she had a very good maize yield harvesting eight bags on half an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, she was only able to harvest two bags of maize on half an acre of land. 
With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Rodah and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance. 
With income from maize sales, Rodah will educate her children, build a house and invest in livestock rearing. In 2012, the members of Maturu Hill Group will each plant maize plots between half and one acre of land.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

In the photograph above, Protus is pictured with his group members. The field officer is on the far left.

With income from maize sales, Peter will educate his children, build a house, and invest in livestock rearing. In 2012, the members of Yetana group will each plant maize plots between half and one acre of land.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Saidu

texts.en:
This is 41-year-old Saidu. He is married and has two children, aged 13 and 8 years. He has one additional dependent who lives with him because he is his relative. 

In 1994, Saidu established his provisions business, selling such items as sugar, milk, mayonnaise, sardines, butter, margarine, coffee, tea, etc. He began his business because he was trained by his parents, who are also petty traders. 

Working seven days a week and eight hours a day, he earns about 1,300,000 Sierra Leone Leones (Le) every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. Saidu requires a loan in order to buy more provisions for his business. In the future, Saidu plans to educate his children and build a dwelling house for his family. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy sugar, milk, mayonnaise, sardines and margarine for his business.

loans.name: Sreytouch

texts.en:
Sreytouch is a 30-year-old mother, married, and has three children; two of whom work at the food store for pay, while the last one is still in school. Sreytouch has been farming and planting for 10 years to support her living. In addition, her husband is a local palm sugar maker and raises additional income. 

Now requesting a first loan with VisionFund, Sreytouch will use this loan to buy crop seeds for her rice field and plantation. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her crop yield, which will sell for a good price, so as to earn more income to feed her family better and also keep her child in school.

loans.use: to buy crop seeds for her rice field and plantation

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Hamro

texts.en: Hamro is a 40 year old married man. He lives in the town of Khujand. He has five children. He has secondary education. Hamro has a plot of land by his house where he grows vegetables and sows legumes. He is taking out the loan to sow vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, mineral fertilizer and fuel.

She is requesting a loan to buy   fashion clothes (blouses, jeans, trousers, shirts) and many items for her business. She plans to expand her business.

loans.name: Ñapua Hagua Oñondivepa Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del presente comité son D. la Cuidad D. Caacupé, son personas muy trabajadoras, ellas están muy agradecidas con la fundación porque gracias a las facilidades D. los créditos ellas pueden acceder a él y D. ese modo invertir en sus negocios y otras iniciar una actividad comercial, ya que todas ellas desean trabajar y ayudar a sus familias.
La presidenta es la señora Deida, ella está casada con  hijos, ella se dedica a la costura. Nos comenta que este ha sido su modo D. ayudar a la familia. Tiene muy buena clientela, como así también pedidos con los cuales les le gustaría poder cumplir. Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. telas, hilos, botones y demás insumos para abastecer su taller y D. esa forma poder cumplir con los pedidos D. sus clientes.
texts.en:
The women in the communal bank are from the city of Caacupé.  They are very hard-working people.  They are very grateful to the Fundación because, thanks to the ease of getting the loans, they are able to access them.  This way some invest in their businesses, and others start a new business activity.  All of them wish to work and help their families.

Deida is the president.  She is married and has children.  She is a seamstress.  She mentions that this has been her way of helping her family.  She has very good customers, and she also has orders, which would like to be able to finish.  She is known as a very hard-working and enterprising woman.

She is requesting the loan to buy fabric, thread, buttons, and other supplies to stock her workshop.  That way she will be able to finish her customers’ orders.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, and other supplies.

loans.name: Wesakulila Group

texts.en:
Peter is the facilitator of the Wesakulila group. Peter and his group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Peter takes care of three children at home. He joined One Acre Fund to access One Acre Fund’s best prices, to ensure food security for his family and later educate them. In the recent 2011 season, Peter had an excellent maize yield harvesting nine bags on ½ acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Peter was only able to harvest 1½ bags of maize on ½ acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Peter and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from his maize sales, Peter will repay the loan.

In 2012, the members of Wesakulila group will each plant maize plots between ½ and 1 acre of land.

In the photograph above, Peter is pictured with his group members.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Las Roseñas Group

texts.es:
El comité "Las Roseñas"se originó a traves de promociones que se realizaron en el barrio de las integrantes. Todas las ellas son de la misma zona, conocidas y vecinas. El objetivo de este grupo es fomentar el espíritu emprendedor y solidario para llegar al nivel máximo del programa.
La Sra. Julia es una de las integrantes, ella nos comenta que tiene una peluquería gracias a la cual ella puede ayudar en la casa, ya que la vida cada vez es más dura, cuenta que gracias a su buena atención ya tiene una clientela bien formada, lo cual la ayuda mucho.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de shampoo, enjuagues, tintes, esmaltes para uñas y demás insumos indispensables para su peluquería. Ella al igual que sus amigas están muy agradecidas por esta oportunidad de progreso que les da la fundación.
texts.en:
The women in the communal bank are from the city of Caacupé.  They are very hard-working people.  They are very grateful to the Fundación because, thanks to the ease of getting the loans, they are able to access them.  This way some invest in their businesses, and others start a business activity.  All of them wish to work and help their families.

The Las Roseñas communal bank started because of the promotions that were done in the members’ neighborhood.  All of them are from the same zone.  They are neighbors, and they know each other.  This group’s objective is to foster an enterprising and supportive spirit in order to arrive at the highest level of the program.

Julia is one of the members.  She tells us that she has a beauty parlor.  Thanks to her beauty parlor she is able to help at home.  Life is harder each day, and thanks to her good service she has an established customer base.  This helps her a lot.

She is requesting the loan to buy shampoo, conditioner, dyes, nail polish, and other indispensable supplies for her beauty shop.  She, like her friends, is very grateful for this opportunity to make progress that the Fundación gives her.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, conditioner, dyes, nail polish, and other supplies.

loans.name: Fumilia B Women Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Fumilia B Women Group in Western Kenya! Agneta is the facilitator of the Fumilia B Women Group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Agneta takes care of seven children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Agneta had an excellent maize yield harvesting 20 bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Agneta was only able to harvest six bags of maize on one acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Agneta and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Agneta will educate her children.

In 2012, the members of Fumilia B Women Group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

The photograph shows Agneta and her group with the field officer who is on the far left

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Jaribu Women Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Jaribu Women Group in Western Kenya! Linet is the facilitator of the Jaribu Women group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Linet takes care of eight children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Linet had an excellent maize yield harvesting 20 bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Linet was only able to harvest 10 bags of maize on one acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Linet and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Linet will educate her children.

In 2012, the members of Jaribu Women group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

The photograph shows Linet and her group with the field officer who is on the far left.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Evelio

texts.es:
El señor Evelio, tiene 29 años de edad, esta acompañado con dos hijos.

Él se ha dedicado a trabajar como jornal y esta actividad la aprendió de sus padres. Evelio solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar 1300 tejas, varas de bambu para las paredes de la casa, por que es de bahareque y para pago de mano de obra. De esta manera él y su familia contaran con una casa propia y segura ya no se verán en la necesidad de alquilar. Evelio desea continuar trabajando con Fundación Campo y brindarle a su familia una vida mejor, seguir trabajando para tener más ingresos y ahorrar.
texts.en:
Evelio is 29 years old, he has a partner and two children.

He has been engaged in working as a day laborer, an activity he has learned from his parents. Evelio is requesting a loan to Fundación Campo to buy 1300 tiles and bamboo poles for the walls of his house, presently made of bahareque (wall made of plaited cane and mud), and to pay for labor costs. In this way he and his family will have a safe house of their own and they will not have to pay rent. Evelio wishes to continue working with Fundación Campo and to offer a better life to his family; he also wants to keep on working to earn more money and to save some.

loans.use: para comprar 1300 tejas, varas de bambu para las paredes de la casa y para pago de mano de obra.

loans.name: Luciana's Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres “Virgen de Fátima” es un grupo que surgió hace 10 años atrás en la ciudad de Ybycui. Empezó a trabajar con la Fundación Paraguaya, pero empezó a trabajar con la fundación desde este año gracias a la promoción hecha a una de las miembros, quien luego de una constante comunicación y visita de la asesora se logró formar un nuevo grupo integrado por 14 mujeres. Las señoras son muy  unidas, responsables y solidarias, mencionaron que se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto en equipo, con mucho esfuerzo y esmero, en forma conjunta dentro del programa Comité de Mujeres.
Una de esas mujeres es la señora Claudia, quien se dedica a la venta de chipas (alimento tradicional paraguayo, preparado a base de almidón), con lo cual puede mantener a su familia. Comenta que esta es un trabajo muy sacrificado, ya que diariamente recorre mucho para vender sus productos, pero nos dice que todo esfuerzo vale la pena para poder ayudar a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de chipas, con lo que podrá seguir con su trabajo y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The group of women called Virgen de Fátima came about ten years ago in the city of Ybycui. Work began with the Fundación Paraguaya, and this year, thanks to a promotion offered by one of the members, and through steady communication and visiting with a counselor, a new group was formed by 14 women. The ladies are very united, trustworthy and caring, and they mentioned that they like working together as a team, with strength and care, working together in the group program.

One of these women is Claudia, who works selling chipas (a traditional Paraguayan food dish, prepared from a base of starch), with which she can support her family. She comments that she makes sacrifices to do this work, she travels about daily in order to sell her products, but she tells us that each effort has value in regards to helping her family.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy chipas, so that she will be able to continue with her work and to help her family.

loans.use: to buy chipas to sell later

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es:
Gabriel tiene 42 años de edad, es casado y tiene 04 hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus hijos, la casa está ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, específicamente en el Caserío Palominos, una zona agrícola productora de mango y limón, ubicada en la región Piura, a cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo. 

Gabriel se dedica a la crianza de ganado menor (ovino y porcino), los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local. Adicionalmente se dedica a la agricultura, tiene una hectárea de terreno agrícola en donde tiene mango y limón en producción.

Por otro lado trabaja como vigilante en un fundo agrícola de la zona, con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad se encarga de sacar adelante a su familia.

Gabriel se encuentra solicitando un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que planea utilizar en la alimentación y sanidad del ganado con el que cuenta, así como en la fertilización de sus frutales. El es un cliente nuevo en Edpyme Alternativa y goza de buenas referencias en la zona donde vive.
texts.en:
Gabriel is 42 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and 4 children.   The house is located in a rural zone of the district of Tambogrande, in a specific area called Caserio Palominos, an agricultural zone where people grow mango, lemons and other fruit.  It's located about 4 hours from the city of Chiclayo.  

Gabriel raises sheep and pigs until they reach an ideal size and weight to sell in the local market.  He also has a small piece of land where he grows mango and lemons.  For additional income, he works as a security guard.  The income from his various businesses has enabled Gabriel to improve the quality of life for his family.  

Gabriel is requesting a loan to purchase food and medicine for his animals, as well as fertilizer for his fruit trees.   He is a new client of Edpyme Alternativa and has good references from his local area.

loans.use: to purchase food and medicine for his livestock, as well as fertilizer for his fruit trees

loans.name: María Francisca

texts.es:
La señora Maria tiene 54 años D. edad, esta casada.

DesD. hace 14 años Maria se dedica a la elaboración y venta D. tortillas, esta actividad la aprendió D. su mamá.

Ella necesita el préstamo, para comprar una plancha para cocer las tortillas, ya que no tiene y las tortillas las elabora en un comal D. barro, por lo que tiene que comprar leña y con la plancha no tendrá que comprar leña, ya que ella tiene una fuerte demanda D. tortillas. A demás con el préstamo comprara maíz, que es la materia prima para elaborar las deliciosas tortillas. Así Maria dispondrá D. todo lo necesario para elaborar las tortillas y satisfacer la demanda, ya que donD. ella vive hay mucha población a la cual le pueD. vender las tortillas, esto le permitirá aumentar sus ingresos y ahorrar, para mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia, realizarle mejoras a su casa y brindar un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Maria is 54 years old and she is married.

She has been engaging in preparing and selling tortillas for 14 years, and she learned this activity from her mother.

She needs a loan to buy a grill to cook tortillas as she has a strong request for tortillas but she hasn’t got one of her own, and she must prepare her tortillas with a brass griddle she needs to buy firewood for; with a grill she will not have to buy firewood. The loan will also be used to buy maize, the basic ingredient to prepare her delicious tortillas; in this way Maria will have everything she needs to prepare tortillas and satisfy her requests, as where she lives there are many people to whom she can sell her tortillas. This will help her increase her income and save some to improve her family’s standard of living, make improvements to her house and proviD. a good service to her customers.

loans.use: To buy a grill to cook tortillas.

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.ru:
Татьяна постоянно использует кредиты давно и берет их постоянно, так как всегда нужны средства на приобретение новых товаров.В этот раз Татьяна берет кредит на закупку семян, удобрений, хозтоваров для магазина.
Предыдущий кредит был использован для тех же целей - увеличение ассортимента, закупки новых семян и удобрений.

Татьяна постоянно пополняет товар, завозит новинки в магазин, много работает. Летом она брала отпуск на две недели ездила на отдых на море.

(на фотографии Татьяна вместе со своим работником)
texts.en:
Tatyana uses loans regularly and takes them often, as she always needs funds to purchase new goods. This time, Tatyana is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and household goods for the store. Her previous loan was used for the same purpose- to increase her range of products and purchase new seeds and fertilizer.Tatyana constantly replenishes her goods; bringing new things to the store is a lot of work. In the summer, she took a vacation for two weeks to go to the sea and rest. 


(photo of Tatyana with her employee)

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizer and household goods for the store

loans.name: Yuliya

texts.ru:
Юлия начинала брать кредиты давно. Считает, что кредитование - удобный способ развития бизнеса. На этот раз она хочет воспользоваться кредитом для закупки новых сортов семян и удобрений. За счет прошлого кредита Юлия расширила торговое место, арендовала еще одно торговое место напротив своего ларька и теперь выкладывает часть товара туда.

У Юлии в семье и в бизнесе все нормально. В доме нужно делать ремонт, но пока на это нет времени. Сын Юлии закончил учебу и уже работает в милиции. Дочь учится в спортшколе, в этом году заканчивает последний класс и собирается поступать в колледж.
texts.en: Yuliya began taking loans long ago. She finds that credit is a convenient way to grow a business. At this time, she would like to use a loan to purchase a new variety of seeds and fertilizer. With her previous loan, Yuliya was able to expand her shop space by renting an additional space across from her stall and putting some of her goods there. Everything in Yuliya's family and business life is normal. She needs to do some repairs at home, but has not had the time yet. Yuliya's son finished studying and now works with the police. Her daughter studies at  sports school; this year she will finish the final year and plans to go to a college.

loans.use: purchase new seed varieties and fertilizer

loans.name: San Miguel Group

texts.es:
San Miguel se formo gracias a la unión D. varias vecinas y amigas D. la ciudad D. Santaní, ellas son mujeres jefas D. familia que tienen como objetivo ayudar a sus familias por medio D. su trabajo y gracias al apoyo D. sus compañeras D. grupo. Ellas están trabajando muy a gusto dentro del programa D. mujeres emprendedoras D. la fundación y les gustaría poder llegar al máximo nivel del programa.
Una D. esas mujeres es la señora Lourdes, quien gracias a su sacrificio y trabajo ha podido ayudar a su familia y sacarlos adelante. Ella nos comenta que se dedica a la cría y venta D. cerdos y gallinas, lo cual la ha ayudado en los gastos diarios D. la casa. Dice que su trabajo es muy sacrificado, pero que le gustaría poder seguir.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. gallinas pequeñas para la cría y posterior venta, así también para la compra D. alimentos para cerdos.
texts.en:
The group,  San Miguel,  was formed thanks to various friends and neighbors in the city of Santani.  These women all take care of families, and shared the goal of generating income to help support their families.   They are all working enthusiastically within the program, "enterprising women" within the foundation and they want to reach the highest level they can.  

One of these women is Lourdes, who thanks to her hard work and sacrifice has been able to help improve the quality of life for her family.  Lourdes raises pigs and hens, which has helped generate income for the daily household expenses.    She says her work is very hard but she would like to continue growing her business.  Her portion of the loan will be used to buy small hens to raise and sell, and to purchase feed for her pigs.

loans.use: to purchase more hens to raise and sell, as well as feed for the pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ceramic tiles, cement, calcium carbonate, bari caoba wood, and joint compound in order install a floor.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es:
Don Alfonso, sigue trabajando en su estudio fotografico, pues ha logrado la captacion de sus cliente, devido  a la nitides de su trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa, quien trabaja como secretaria, sus hijos estudiando en la universidad,  con estos prestamos se ha ayudado bastantante, ya que ha logrado mantener sus equipos activos, compra de materia prima, con su credito anterior no logro el objetivo, devido a que tuvo que comprar tarjeta de procesador por que le comenzo a dar problemas.
Hoy con este nuevo financiamiento comprara dos baterias grip, para seguir, haciendo sus tomas perfecta, para este mes de Diciembre es bueno devido a las promociones de colegio, universidades, aumenta la produccion de sus videos, fotos, y se presenta a muchos eventos, que le dejan buena ganancias.
texts.en:
Don Alfonso continues to work in his photography studio. He has been able to attract customers because of the sharpness of his work. With the help of his wife, who works as a secretary, his children have been able to attend the university. The loans have been of adequate help in allowing him to maintain his equipment and buy supplies. However, he did not accomplish this goal with his previous loan. He had to use the money to buy a processing card because he began experiencing problems with his computer.

Today this new loan will enable him to buy two battery grips so that he can continue taking perfect photos. The month of December is a busy time with high school and university graduations. By increasing his production of videos and photos for these multiple events, he should generate good earnings.

loans.use: to purchase two battery grips.

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es:
José tiene 19 años de edad, es soltero, vive con sus padres y esta estudiando en la universidad.

Él se ha dedicado desde muy pequeño a la agricultura, fueron sus padres los que le enseñaron. José siembra maíz y maicillo, se levanta a las 3:30 a.m. todos los días, porque alimenta y ordeña a sus vacas, a las 4:30 a.m. las va a dejar a un terreno y él se va a trabajar a sus cultivos, para llegar ahí tiene que recorrer un kilómetro.

Los insumos agrícolas que necesita, los compra en una ciudad del oriente del país, por mayor comodidad. José ya tiene listos sus cultivos, para ser recolectados, por eso solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar una yunta de bueyes, que le facilite el traslado del maíz y ahorrarse ese pago, ya que en su comunidad ese servicio es pagado a un precio alto. Cuando termine de utilizar los bueyes los venderá, para recibir ese ingreso. Al tener un mayor margen de ganancia, le servirá para mantener a su familia, pagarse su estudio y terminar su carrera universitaria que es su mayor sueño.
texts.en:
José is nineteen years old. He is single, living with his parents, and is studying at the university.

José has been working in agriculture since he was very young. His parents were the ones who taught him agricultural skills. José plants corn and sorghum and wakes up at 3:30 AM every day to feed and milk his cows. At 4:30 AM he takes the cattle to their pasture and he walks one kilometer to attend to his crops.

He buys the necessary agricultural supplies in a city in the east of the country, for convenience. José has his crops ready to be harvested, and that is why is asking for a loan from Fundación Campo to purchase a team of oxen. This would facilitate that transport of corn and would save him money, since in his community this service is offered at a very high price. When he is finished using the oxen he will sell them to get that revenue back. 

By having a higher profit margin, he will be able to support his family, pay for his studies, and finish his college career which is his biggest dream.

loans.use: to buy a team of oxen.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El señor  Julio Cesar, tiene 38 años de edad, vive en la comunidad de Maira del municipio de Mizque, del  departamento de Cochabamba.
Trabaja en la agricultura, produce: cebolla, papa y tomate; y los comercializa en el mismo lugar.
Es una persona muy respetada en su comunidad, por la dedicación a su trabajo y por ser el responsable de sus hermanos menores.
Julio Cesar, está solicitando el presente crédito para comprar semillas y agroquimicos, aumentar más superficies de cultivo y aumentar  su producción y de esta forma tener más ingresos y mejorar las condiciones de vida de él y de sus hermanos.
texts.en: Julio is 38 years old and lives in the community of Maira, in the municipality of Mizque in Cochabamba.   Julio is a farmer. He grows onions, potatoes and tomatoes to sell in his local area.    Julio is well respected in his community for his dedication and work,  and for taking good care of his younger brothers.  He is requesting a loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers to grow more types of produce and increase his production.  With the increased income he hopes to be able to improve the living conditions for himself and his brothers.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his farming business.

loans.name: Gennady

texts.ru: Генадий женат. Его супругу зовут Анастасия. У них трое детей, которых они очень любят. Генадий имеет свой собственный бизнес. Он занимается выращиванием ранних овощей  и винограда. У него девять больших теплиц и 800 кустов винограда.  Генадий выбрал правильное направление, так как виноград почти никто не выращивает, а спрос есть и цена держится высокая весь сезон. Он ответственный и трудолюбивый, имеет большое желание развиваться. Цель Генадия - дать образование детям и помочь им начать самостоятельную жизнь. Также он хочет сделать ремонт в доме. Генадий просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 20000 гривен для закупки материалов для теплиц и удобрений. Генадий планирует заниматься  полностью выращиванием винограда, а для этого ему нужно переделать теплицы. Генадию нужны сделать теплицы больше и выше.
texts.en: Gennady is married. His wife's name is Anastasia. They have three children whom they love very much. Gennady has his own business. He is engaged in the cultivation of early vegetables and grapes. He has nine large greenhouses and 800 vines. Gennady has chosen the right direction since almost no one grows grapes, but there's a demand and the price stays high all season. He is responsible and hardworking, has a great desire to grow. Gennady's goal is to educate children and help them start an independent life. He also wants to make repairs in the house. Gennady is asking for a loan in the amount of 20,000 hryvna to buy materials for greenhouses and fertilizers. Gennady plans to fully engage in the cultivation of grapes and for this he needs to remodel the greenhouse. Gennady need to make the greenhouses bigger and taller.

loans.use: to buy materials for greenhouses and fertilizer.

loans.name: Shirley Oliva

texts.es:
Shirley, es una joven de 27 años, es madre soltera de un niño de 3 años, vive en la comunidad de Mallco Rancho  en la casa de sus padres, pues hasta hace un año atrás vivía con el padre de su hijo, y por problemas de pareja decidió separarse.
 Shirley trabaja  más de 4 años en un Bar, el cargo que ocupa es  BARMAN  , trabaja de noche en horarios 7:00 pm hasta 1:00 am , mientras trabaja al hijo le cuida la hermana mayor .
El destino del crédito es para la construcción (mano de obra fina) de su casa, ya que los padres le heredaron un terreno en donde Shirley con sus ahorros ya empezó a construir.
Entre sus sueños y metas es, terminar de construir su casa para poder ya irse a vivir junto a su hijo, y lo más importante es que en futuro tener su propio Bar ya que a Shirley le gusta dedicarse a esa actividad.
texts.en:
Shirley is a 27 year old young woman.  She is the single mother of a 3 year old child.  She lives in parents’ house in the Mallco Rancho community.  Up until a year ago she lived with the father of her child.  However, they had problems and decided to separate.

She has worked in a bar for over four years.  She works as a bartender.  She works nights from 7:00 p.m. until 1:00 a.m.  Her older sister takes care of Shirley’s child while she is working.

The loan is for (manual labor) to build her house.  Shirley inherited land from her parents, and with her savings she has already started construction.

Among her dreams and goals is finishing construction of her house.  Then she will be able to go and live together with her child.  The most important thing in the future is to have her own bar.  Shirley likes devoting herself to this business activity.

loans.use: to pay for construction of her house.

loans.name: Lucas

texts.es:
El Sr. Lucas tiene 41 años de edad, casado desde hace 16 años, tiene 2 hijos de 7 y 15 años de edad, los dos están estudiando, vive en la Unión Lempira.
Don Lucas es agricultor, tiene 18 años de dedicarse al cultivo de café y granos básicos como maíz y frijoles. Su padre heredo 2 manzanas de terreno para cultivar, y desde joven empezó a trabajar haciendo viveros  de café,  se dio cuenta que este cultivo era algo que le gustaba y actualmente es un negocio rentable, por eso se a propuesto a dedicarle mas tiempo.
Está muy agradecido con el préstamo  porque va comprar fertilizantes para darle mejor asistencia y mantenimiento a la finca de café y cultivo de granos básicos,  con el fin de sacar buenas cosechas.
De las   ganancias va mejorar la vivienda y continuara apoyando a sus hijos con el estudio.
texts.en:
Señor Lucas is 41 years old.  He has been married for the last 16 years and has two children aged 7 and 15 who both attend school.  He lives in La Unión, in Lempira.

Don Lucas is a farmer who has been working growing coffee and basic grains such as corn and beans for the last 18 years.  His father inherited 2 areas of farmland, and he started working with coffee plants when he was young.  He realized that this crop was something he enjoyed, and currently it is a profitable business.  For this reason he decided to dedicate more time to it.

He is very grateful for the loan because he will be able to purchase fertilizers that will help him with upkeep for his crops of coffee and basic grains, with the end-goal of having good harvests.

With the profits, he will improve his home and continue to support his children in their education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and clean out his property so as to achieve a better harvest.

loans.name: Mayra Jacinta

texts.es:
Mayra es una mujer de 28 años que tiene dos hijos, uno de 5 y otro de 11 años. Juntos viven en la Cooperativa Santa Martha de la provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas en el Ecuador. Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas es una provincia nueva, que era parroquia rural de Quito (capital del país); está entre la costa y la sierra del Ecuador, punto de enlace entre Quito, Guayaquil, Portoviejo,  y otras ciudades importantes. Situado en los flancos externos de la cordillera occidental, así como en la planicie costeña inferior a los 1000 msnm, es la zona de mayor pluviosidad del país. Tiene una gran riqueza hidrológica: existen cinco cuencas y micro cuencas importantes. Es una zona climática lluviosa subtropical, posee una temperatura promedio de 22 °C.

Ella es propietaria de un pequeño negocio de comida rápida, la mejora de la vialidad en esta provincia le ha beneficiado ya que ahora mucha gente visita el sector donde realiza sus ventas. Vende hamburguesas y papas fritas y ella está en búsqueda de un crédito para así ampliar su negocio y tener mejores ganancias; Mayra quiere comprar un coche para preparar su comida y así poder movilizarse y tener más ventas.

Sus pequeños hijos le ayudan durante su jornada de trabajo y juntos quieren hacer realidad sus sueños que son el tener un local de comida grande, amplio y con varias sucursales. De esta manera sus hijos podrán tener su estudio seguro y una calidad de vida mejor.
texts.en:
Mayra is a 28 year-old woman who has 2 children aged 5 and 11.  They live together in the Santa Martha Cooperative in the province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas in Ecuador.  Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas is a new province, that was previously a rural parish of Quito (the capital of the country).  It lies between the coast and the mountains of Ecuador, a connecting point between Quito, Guayquil, Portoviejo and other important cities. It is situated on the outer edges of the western mountains and in the lower coastal plain at 1000 meters above sea level. This area has the highest rainfall in the country. There is a great abundance of water as there are 5 important river basins and micro basins here. It is a rainy, subtropical zone and the average temperature is 22 °C. 

Mayra is the owner of a small fast food business. She has benefited from the improvement of the roads in this province, because now many people visit the area where she makes her sales.  She sells hamburgers and french fries, and she is seeking a loan to expand her business so that she can have better earnings.  Mayra wants to buy a fast food cart where she could prepare her food and also move around to get more sales.  

Her small children help her during her working day, and together they want to make her dreams a reality; she dreams of having a big restaurant with a lot of branches.  In this way her children will be able to count on getting an education and will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a fast food cart

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
Doña Marlene de 51 años de edad, casada, madre de 5 hijos, todos ellos independientes, ella es comerciante se dedica a la venta de comida y nacatamales lleva 18 años dedicándose a este negocio. Inicio con sus actividades con dinero propio y apoyo de su esposo, compro materia prima para empezar con sus nacatamales tenia 33 años edad cuando comenzó. Anteriormente tenía una pulpería pero decidió quitarla para dedicarse a la venta de este delicioso plato típico.  
Ella requiere para compra de maíz, leña, carne,verduras, arroz. Ya que son los principales ingredientes que utiliza para realizar sus tan apetecidos  nacatamales. Uno de sus proyectos próximos es terminar de construir su casa que esta algo deteriorada e invertir en mejoras a su negocio.
texts.en:
Marlene is 51 years old, she is married and she has 5 children, all economically independent. She is a retailer and she engages in selling meals and “nactamales” (typical dish made of maize, meat and rice wrapped in banana leaf), something she has been doing for 18 years. She started her activity with her own money and with some help form her husband. She began by buying ingredients for her nactamales, and she was 33 when she started. She had been previously running a corner shop but she decided to close it to engage in selling this typical delicious dish.
She is requesting a loan to buy maize, firewood, meat, vegetables and rice, as these are the main ingredients she uses to prepare her really tasty nactamales. One of her future projects is to finish building her house as it is a bit dilapidated and to invest in improving her activity.

loans.use: To buy maize, firewood, meat, rice and vegetables.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
El cliente  es casado tiene cuatro hijos y radica en el trópico de Cochabamba, en el Municipio de Entre ríos, desde hace 11 años.
EL cliente es de la localidad de  San Julián del departamento de Santa Cruz, vino de su comunidad como la mayoría de las personas buscando mayor oportunidad de vida, por lo que decidió ir al trópico, pero con el transcurso del tiempo,  se compró su lote agrícola y se dedicó a la cría de ganado vacuno, empezó con un par, poco a poco fue aumentando, hoy en día aún  necesita más capital para seguir creciendo. 
El crédito que está solicitando es para la construcción de su vivienda, porque solo vive en una casa de madera provisional, con el crédito podrá realizar su casita de material mas solido, como ladrillo, así de esta manera podrá vivir en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Jorge is married and has 4 children.  He has lived in the Tropics of Cochabamba, in the municipality of Entre Rios, for 11 years.  Jorge is originally from the town of San Julián in the department of Santa Cruz.  He came to this community like most people, looking for better life opportunities, so decided to go to the Tropics.  Over time he bought a plot of agricultural land and decided to raise dairy cows.  He began with a pair, and gradually increased his stock.  Today he needs more capital so that he can keep moving forward.

He is requesting a loan to build his house, because he lives in a temporary wooden house.  With this loan, he will be able to make a house out of more solid materials, such as brick.  In this way, he will have better living conditions.

loans.use: to build a house

loans.name: Primitiva

texts.es:
Primitiva de 36 años, convive hace 12 años con Sergio, su pareja. Ambos tienen 2 hijos de 12 y 10 años. Esta familia vive en el anexo de Ricricán en el distrito de Palcamayo. Primitiva es una mujer que ve en el esfuerzo la esencia misma del progreso. Por esa razón se desempeña en un negocio de verduras en el mercado mayorista, donde cuenta con dos puestos de venta. 
Su trabajo consiste en la compra al por mayor de verduras, de la cuidad de Lima, como son: camotes, tomates, ají colorado, limón, apio de la costa, etc. A la vez, cuenta con sembríos propios de papa, pero solo es para el consumo de su familia, ya que se dedica de lleno a las verduras. “No es necesario que viaje, como tengo varios años en este negocio, solo envío dinero, como 3000 a 4000 soles, y la mercadería me llega cada martes o jueves. Es bien rentable.”, Explica. Son 3 años los que lleva en el trabajo. Los miércoles y viernes viaja a la selva central (La Merced), para expender sus productos. De esa manera, Primitiva construirá su casa en el mismo centro de Palcamayo, donde ya cuenta con un terreno propio. Con su ayuda, Primitiva accederá a su préstamo número 15 de MFP. Se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Afirma que le agrada el trabajo de su banco comunal, por la solidaridad y oportunidad de emprendimiento.
De recibir el dinero del crédito, invertirá todo en la compra de verduras para continuar con el negocio.
texts.en:
Primitiva is 36 years old and has been in a common-law relationship with her partner Sergio for 12 years. They have two children, ages 12 and 10. This family lives in the annex of Ricricán, which is located in the District of Palcamayo. Primitiva is a woman who strives to make progress. For this reason, she has established a business selling vegetables at the wholesale market where she has two vending stalls.

Her work consists of selling vegetables in bulk from the city of Lima such as sweet potatoes, tomatoes, red chili peppers, lemons, coastal celery, and other items. She also grows her own potatoes, but only for family consumption. Primitiva devotes herself to selling vegetables full-time. She explains, “I have no need to travel since I have been in this business for several years. I send the money, between 3000 to 4000 PEN, and the merchandise arrives every Tuesday or Thursday. It is very profitable.” Primitiva has been doing this work for three years. On Wednesdays and Fridays, she travels to La Merced in the central jungle to distribute her products. She plans to build a house in central Palcamayo where she has her own land.

Primitiva will access her 15th loan with MFP. She promises to be punctual with her loan payments. Primitiva indicates that she is in agreement with the work of her Communal Bank that promotes unity and entrepreneurial opportunities. Upon receiving her loan, Primitiva plans to invest all of the money in the purchase of vegetables so that she can continue her business.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a motorcycle to transport him to his fields.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma de 36 años de edad, está felizmente casada con Clemente, con quien tiene 4 hijos de 19, 16, 10 y 8 años. Toda esta familia vive en una casa propia en la ciudad de Tarma.
Norma nació en el anexo de Ricricán – Palcamayo, al igual que su esposo, ahí tienen una casa propia y terrenos de cultivos. Pero por la educación de sus hijos tuvieron que salir de su lugar natal hacia la ciudad de Tarma. Ella se dedica a la agricultura, con la siembra de papas de las variedades: “Yungay” y “Jilguero”. Producción que vende satisfactoriamente en el mercado mayorista de Tarma. “El trabajo en la chacra (terrenos de cultivos), es duro, yo y mi esposo sembramos, limpiamos, abonamos, de todo hacemos”, comenta.
Norma distribuye bien su tiempo para que pueda atender su hogar y a sus hijos, quienes también apoyan en las labores de la casa.
Con esta actividad, Norma espera brindarle una buena calidad de vida a su familia, y más adelante ver a sus hijos desarrollarse profesionalmente.  “Quiero que ellos logren lo que yo no pude en mi tiempo”, puntualiza esperanzada. Con su apoyo, ella podrá acceder a su préstamo número 15 de MFP. Da su palabra de ser puntual en el pago de las mensualidades. Por su parte se siente contenta y alentada con el trabajo en equipo de su banco comunal. De recibir el dinero, podrá adquirir alrededor de 10 bolsas de abono orgánico para fertilizar sus terrenos de papas, para la cosecha de mayo, junio y julio.
texts.en:
Norma is 36 years old and happily married to Clemente. They have four children (ages 19, 16, 10, and 8). She and her entire family live in their own home in the city of Tarma.

Norma was born in the annex of Ricricán – Palcamayo, just like her husband. There they have a house and farmland. However, they had to leave their birthplace so that their children could pursue their education in the city of Tarma. Norma is a farmer who grows potatoes of the “Yungay” and “Jilguero” varieties. She successfully sells what she produces at the wholesale market in Tarma. Norma says, “The work on the farm is hard. My husband and I plant the seeds, clear the weeds, fertilize, and perform all of the work.” Norma successfully manages her time between looking after the home and taking care of her children, who also help with the household chores. Through her business, Norma hopes to provide a good quality of life for her family.
