Here we meet Señora Martha, age 36. She is separated and has a 9 year old daughter from her former relationship who studies at school. She lives in her parents’ house.

In order to make a living and assure that her daughter doesn’t lack anything, Martha works washing other people’s clothing and also sells clothing of all types. She sells door-to-door. She also sells out of her house to customers with whom she is better acquainted. She works every day spending as much time washing clothes as selling them. Her customers buy on credit, and she collects every eight days. She purchases merchandise at Puertoviejo whenever she needs to. She has had her business for two years, and thanks to this she has been able to help her daughter progress.

This loan is going to be used to buy more merchandise such as trousers, blouses, t-shirts, and detergent. She has been with the communal bank for two cycles and likes it because of the help that has been given to her with loans. Her dreams are to give a better life to her daughter and to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy trousers, blouses, t-shirts,and detergent.

loans.name: Isabel Rocio

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Mujeres Unidas De Los Bajos se reúnen cada 15 días en Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su riqueza cultural y por su artesanía como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país.

Aquí conocimos a Isabel, tiene 24 años, es soltera y vive en casa de sus padres junto a sus hermanos menores. Lleva dos ciclos  en el Banco Comunal, es la fiscal de pagos del grupo y le gusta porque los créditos le facilitan su vida.

Ella trabaja en una casa en la ciudad de Montecristi realizando los quehaceres domesticas, esto lo hace de lunes a viernes ya que los fines de semana se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende por el lugar donde trabaja a sus conocidos, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada ocho días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a Portoviejo cada vez que necesita. Lleva cuatro años con su negocio y  le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños ya que quiere aprovechar la temporada de Navidad y Año Nuevo que es muy bueno.
 
Su sueño es tener un local en Montecristi para vender ropa.
texts.en:
The communal bank group called Mujeres Unidas de los Bajos get together twice a month in the city of Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known for its rich culture and for its handicrafts such as the straw hats known inside and outside the country.

Here we meet Isabel, who is 24 years old, single and lives together at home with her parents and her younger brothers. She has had two cycles with the Communal Bank and it is the group assessments that she likes because it makes her life easier. 

She works at home in the city of Montecristi, currently doing housework. She does this Monday through Friday and on the weekends she works selling all types of clothing. She sells door-to-door and also she sells from the place where she works to people she knows, giving her customers credit and collecting payment every 8 days. She go to Portoviejo to buy her merchandise each time that she needs to. She has been in this business for 4 years and it is going very well.

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise such as pants, blouses, t-shirts and children’s clothing as she wants to take advantage of the Christmas and New Year season that is approaching when sales are good.

Her dream is to have her own store in Montecristi in order to sell clothing.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts and children’s clothing

loans.name: San Blas Group

texts.es:
San Blas es el grupo de la ciudad de Encarnación, está integrado por 13 mujeres trabajadoras y luchadoras quienes diariamente se esfuerzan por darle a sus hijos y familiares las comodidades mínimas para que puedan tener una vida digna y decorosa.
La señora Diana tiene una cantina bien surtida con todo tipo de productos, cuenta que siempre tiene mucha venta, por lo que tiene buena ganancia. Ella cuenta que gracias a su pequeña cantina ella puede sacar adelante a su familia y de esa forma darle lo mínimo, para que ellos no pasen por carencias.
Ella solicita la ayuda de fundación paraguaya y de kiva, para la compra de bebidas, golosinas, galletitas y demás productos que siempre tienen salida.
texts.en:
San Blas is a group in the city of Encarnación. It is made up of 13 hardworking and enterprising women who strive every day to give their children and families and minimum comforts so that they can have dignified and proper lives.

Señora Diana has a well-stocked shop with all types of products. She has always had a lot of sales so that she has good earnings. Thanks to her little shop her family can get ahead and she can meet their minimum needs so that they don’t face deprivation. She is applying for help from Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva in order to purchase drinks, sweets, crackers, and other products that she always has in stock.

loans.use: to purchase drinks, sweets, crackers, and other products.

loans.name: Patricia Del Carmen

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Mujeres Unidas De Los Bajos se reúnen cada 15 días en Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su riqueza cultural y por su artesanía como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país.

En este lugar vive la señora Patricia, tiene 24 años y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 5 y de 1 año de edad, el mayor esta en jardín de infantes. El marido es ebanista. 

Ella trabaja en una fábrica de la localidad pero también se dedica a la venta productos de Avon, y Yanbal (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja los fines de  semana en sus ventas y de lunes a viernes por las noches ya que a esa hora encuentra a alguna de sus clientes que trabajan durante el dia,  deja a crédito y cobra semanalmente,  lleva 2 años dedicada a esta labor.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos y cremas. Está en el Banco Comunal dos ciclos y le gusta por la unión del grupo.
 
Su meta es terminar de construir  su casa.
texts.en:
The communal bank group called Mujeres Unidas de los Bajos get together twice a month in the city of Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known for its rich culture and for its handicrafts such as the straw hats known inside and outside the country.

In this place lives Patricia, who is 24 years old. She lives with a partner and from this union she has two children who are 5 and 1 year of age. The older child is in kindergarten. Her husband is a cabinetmaker.

She works in a local factory but she also sells Avon products, and Yanbal (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and accessories for women). She works on the weekends and during the evenings from Monday to Friday on her sales because this is the time she can find some of her customers, since they work during the day. She leaves her products on credit and she collects payment once a week. She has been doing this for 2 years.

She is going to use this loan to buy perfumes, costume jewelry, cosmetics and creams. This is her second cycle in the communal bank and she likes it because of the unity of the group.

Her goal is to finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, costume jewelry, cosmetics and creams

loans.name: Mercedes Mariana

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Mujeres Unidas De Los Bajos se reúnen cada 15 días en Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su riqueza cultural y por su artesanía como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país.

Aquí conocimos a la señora Mercedes, tiene 46 años y es madre soltera de  un hijo, el mismo que ya es mayor de edad y aun vive con ella con su familia. Lleva dos ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la oportunidad de recibir la ayuda que le brinda la institución.

Ella para ganarse el sustento diario se dedica a la venta de  frutas y verduras. Trabaja todos los días desde las  05h00 hasta las 11h00, se desplaza desde la madrugada hasta el mercado mayorista a comprar los mejores productos para luego regresar a su localidad y recorrer este lugar y sitios cercanos en un triciclo ofreciendo sus productos, viene dedicada a esta actividad por más de cinco años y gracias a este negocio puede salir adelante.

Este crédito es para comprar frutas y legumbres. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio y le gusta porque con los créditos puede financiarse sin tener que pagar altos intereses.
 
Su sueño es comprar un carro para ir a otros lugares a vender sus productos.
texts.en:
The Banco Comunal Mujeres Unidas De Los Bajos (United Women of Los Bajos Communal Bank) meet every 15 days in Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known both for its cultural riches and handicrafts such as Panama hats, which are known both inside and outside the country. Here we meet Señora Mercedes, age 46. She is a single mother with one adult son who still lives with her with his family.

Mercedes has been with the communal bank for two cycles. She likes it because of the opportunity of receiving help that the institution offers.

In order to earn a daily living, Mercedes is engaged in the sale of fruits and vegetables. She works every day from 5:00 until 11:00. She leaves very early in the morning for the largest market in order to buy the best products and then return to her location and travel around on a tricycle offering her products for sale. She has been involved in this business for more than five years and thanks to the business is able to get ahead.

This loan is for the purchase of fruits and vegetables. She has been in the communal bank since the beginning and likes it because with the loans she can finance herself without having to pay high interest. Her dream is to buy a car so that she can go to other places to sell her products.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Rosa Teodora

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Mujeres Unidas De Los Bajos se reúnen cada 15 días en Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su riqueza cultural y por su artesanía como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Rosa, tiene 56 años, está casada y de esta relación tienen siete hijos, 6 de ellos ya son mayores de edad y el menor de 11 años que  estudian en escuela, dos de sus hijos aun  viven con ella. Su esposo trabaja ocasionalmente.
 
Ella es una muy buena ama de casa y además muy trabajadora, para ganar algo y con esto ayudar a su marido para sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la preparación y venta de tortillas de maíz, yuca, humitas ( bocadillo o plato típico de la provincia) y corviches, todos los días ella prepara estos bocadillos y luego vende en su casa y también su marido cuando está desocupado sale a vender por toda la localidad y sitios aledaños, ella lleva más de 10 años dedicada a esta actividad y es así como han podido salir adelante ya que lo que gana su marido es muy poco.

Este crédito es para comprar maíz, maní, queso y otros víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio y le gusta porque el grupo es unido y se reúnen en su casa. 

Su sueño es tener buena salud para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The communal bank group called Mujeres Unidas de los Bajos get together twice a month in the city of Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known for its rich culture and for its handicrafts such as the straw hats known inside and outside the country.

In this place we meet Rosa who is 56 years old. She is married and from this relationship she has 7 children. Six of them are already older and two are still living with her, and the youngest is 11 years old, and is a student in school. Her husband works occasionally. 

She is a very good housekeeper and also a hard-worker. In order to make a living and to help her husband bring up the family she works preparing corn tortillas, yucca, humitas, (a typical snack or dish from the province) and ceviche. Every day she prepares these dishes and later she sells them from her home and her husband helps when he is not working, going throughout the neighborhood and surrounding areas. She has been doing this for more than 10 years and it is how she has been able to get ahead as her husband earns very little.

This loan is to buy corn, peanuts, cheese and other supplies needed to prepare the food. She has been in the communal bank since the beginning and she likes it because the group is united and it meets in her home.

Her dream is to have good health and to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy corn, peanuts, cheese and other supplies

loans.name: Diana Margarita

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Mujeres Unidas De Los Bajos se reúnen cada 15 días en Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su riqueza cultural y por su artesanía como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Diana, tiene 25 años, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 5, 4 y 2 años de edad, el  mayor estudian en jardín de infantes. Su esposo es comerciante.

Ella realiza el crédito para el negocio del esposo el mismo que tiene un puesto en el mercado de Tarqui en la  ciudad de Manta en el que vende frutas y verduras. Trabaja de martes a domingo. Su esposo se desplaza desde la madrugada hasta el mercado mayorista a comprar los mejores productos para sus clientes ya que las personas lo prefieren porque siempre vende un buen producto, tiene este negocio 3 años y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar frutas y legumbres. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio y le gusta porque con los créditos puede financiarse sin tener que pagar altos intereses.
 
Su sueño es seguir adelante en el grupo.
texts.en:
The "Mujeres Unidas De Los Bajos" ["United Women of Los Bajos"] communal bank meets every 15 days in Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known both for its cultural riches and for handicrafts such as Panama hats, which are known both within the country and abroad.

This is where we met Ms. Diana. She is 25 years old, married, and has three children from her marriage. They are 5, 4, and 2 years old and the oldest attends pre-school. Her husband is a merchant.

Diana is taking out this loan for her husband's business. He has a stand in the Tarqui market in the city of Manta, where he sells fruits and vegetables. He works from Monday to Sunday. Diana's husband leaves at dawn for the wholesale market in order to buy the best products for his customers. People prefer him because he always sells good produce. He has had this business for three years and it is going very well.

This loan is to buy fruits and vegetables. Diana has been in the communal bank since it's initiation and she likes it because she can get loans without paying high interest rates.

Her dream is to continue moving forward with the group.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Wendy

texts.es: Wendy, tiene la edad  de 28 años, está en unión libre y vive con su hijo y su esposo que es son su mayor prioridad. Ella pretende con el crédito comprar una máquina para la confección de ropa. Ella actualmente cuenta con un equipo de trabajo ya establecido y necesita esta máquina para facilitar aun más su trabajo. Ella con esta máquina pretende darles a sus clientes un trabajo más eficaz y rápido atendiendo las necesidades de los clientes. Ella querer seguir creciendo con su proyecto cada día y mejorar su estabilidad económica  teniendo así un mejor bienestar familiar para ella y su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Wendy is 28 years old and in a common law marriage. She lives with her husband and son, who are her main priority. With the loan, she intends to buy a sewing machine to make clothes. At present, she already has work equipment set up and she needs this sewing machine to facilitate her work even more.  With this machine, she hopes to give her customers quicker and more efficient work to attend to their needs. She wants to keep growing with her project every day and improve her financial stability in order to have more wellbeing for her and her family. This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She hasn't had any other loans before in government banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan with better conditions and much lower interests.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Rana

texts.en:
Rana is a 35-year-old married woman from Marka, Amman, Jordan and a mother of four children.

Rana is trading in clothes from her home and she is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase clothes to sell.

Rana is looking to open a shop for her business instead of working form home. She is also looking to save money for her children's future.

loans.use: To purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en:
Aisha is a 48-year-old woman from Marka, Amman, Jordan and a mother of six children.

Aisha is trading in accessories and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase more accessories to sell.

Aisha is looking to improve her business and increase her family's income.

Due to culturA. issues, the man in the photo is Aisha's husband.

loans.use: to purchase accessories to sell

loans.name: Maisa

texts.en:
Maisa is a 38 year-old woman from Irbid, Jordan and a mother of four children.

Maisa decorates flowers and then sells them. She operates from home and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase materials needed for her business such as ribbons, glue...etc.

Maisa is looking to expand her bsuiness by increasing her sales volume.

loans.use: to purchase ribbons, glue, etc)

loans.name: Bindu

texts.en:
Bindu, age 55, established her vegetable farming business in 1995. She works her farmland four hours a day, seven days a week. She has already received and successfully repaid five loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent loan proceeds to buys seeds and fertilizers. She and her husband have raised one child, now 38. In the future, Bindu plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. 

Over 70 percent of Nepal's economy is agricultural. Typically, Nepali households grow crops on small plots of terraced land. Rice (bhat), lentils (daal), and vegetables (thakari) are the staples of the Nepali diet.  With a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to purchase greater quantities of seeds and fertilizer. With more seeds and fertilizer, a borrower is able to grow cash crops to be sold in the local market. Such crops allow households to move beyond subsistence and provide much-needed cash income throughout the year.

loans.use: to buys seeds and fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Shova

texts.en:
Shova is 34 years-old, married and has two children ages 14 and seven.  In 1995, she established  her vegetable farming business.  Working seven days a week and four hours a day, she supports her family.  

She has already received and successfully repaid three loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent loan to buy seeds and fertilizers.  

In the future, Shova plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  

She thanks you for your support.

-----------------------------------------

Over 70% of Nepal's economy is agricultural.  Typically, Nepali households grow crops on small plots of terraced land.  Rice (bhat), lentils (daal), and vegetables (thakari) are the staples of the Nepali diet.  With a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to purchase greater amounts of seed and fertilizer.  With more seeds and fertilizer, a borrower is able to grow cash crops to be sold in the local market.  Such crops allow households to move beyond subsistence and provide much-needed cash income throughout the year.

loans.use: to buys seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado María Auxiliadora, es de la ciudad de Encarnación, está compuesto por 10 mujeres, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad. Se unieron con el propósito de obtener un bien para ellas y para sus familiares, y ven en la fundación paraguaya una gran ayuda para ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Irene, quien nos comenta que día a día trabaja con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio para poder obtener mayores ingresos y de esa forma poder ayudar a su familia. Comenta que se dedica a la venta de ropas, con lo cual puede ayudar en la casa y a la familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de verano, ya que se acerca el calor y quiere estar preparada para la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group, called “María Auxiliadora,” is from the city of Encarnación, and made up of ten ladies, all friends and residents of that city.  They got together in order for them to benefit themselves and their families.  The see “Fundación Paraguaya” as a great help to them.

Irene is one of the members and she tells us that she works hard each day to be able to increase her income and in this way be able to help her family.  She sells clothing.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy summer clothing.  Now that the warm season is approaching, she wants to be prepared for her customers’ demands.

loans.use: to buy summer clothing for resale.

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El comité Kuña Katupyry  se formó con la unión D. varias vecinas D. la ciudad D. Mariano Roque Alonso.  Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, pero también hacen actividades en grupo, con lo cual pueden fortalecer su compañerismo. 
La Señora Blanca es una D. las integrantes del comité, ella se dedica a las ventas D. Ropas varias, venD. por la calle, es decir en forma ambulante, es una señora muy trabajadora y con muchas ganas D. salir adelante.  Nos comenta que tiene  4  hijos, quienes son su razón D. lucha. Se encuentra muy satisfecha con su actividad y las capacitaciones que recibe el grupo. 
La señora Blanca solicita el crédito para la compra D. más variedad D. Ropas, con lo cual podrá cumplir con la demanda D. sus clientes.
texts.en:
The “Kuña Katupyry” Committee was formed by residents of the city of Mariano Roque Alonso.  Today all of its members run different businesses, but also do things as a group that helps strengthen their camaraderie.

Blanc is one of the members.  She sells different types of clothing in the street, that is to say, on foot.  She is a very hardworking lady with a great desire to get ahead, and tells us that she has four children who are the reason for her efforts.  She is very satisfied with the training she gets from this group.

She is asking for this loan to buy a greater variety of clothing so that she can meet her customer’s demands.

loans.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: Mujeres Amanecer Group

texts.es:
Este Comité se formo gracias a una D. las miembros. El motivo por el que se esforzó en formar este grupo fue las ganas D. ayudar a cada una D. ellas ya que todas tienen ganas D. salir adelante por todo el esfuerzo que están realizando en este pequeño lapso D. tiempo que llevan dentro del comité.
Una D. ellas es la señora Vicenta, quien se dedica a la venta D. todo tipo D. artículos, como ser sabanas, frazadas, prendas y demás productos. Gracias a este trabajo sacrificado, ella ha podido sacar adelante a su familia, y nos comenta que está muy orgullosa D. lo que hace, pues es un trabajo honesto y digno.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. sabanas, frazadas y prendas, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group was formed, thanks to its members who wanted to be able to help one-another.  They all have a desire to get ahead through the great effort they’ve maD. in this short amount of time in the committee.

Vicenta, one of the members, sells all types of items, such as bed sheets, blankets, and other products.  Thanks to this work, she has been able to get her family ahead.  She tells us that she’s very happy doing what she does; it’s honest and dignified work.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy sheets, blankets, and clothing, so that she can stock up and meet her customer demand.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
Maria Auxiliadora lleva por nombre el grupo integrado por 15 mujeres de la ciudad de  Itá, quienes se unieron con el propósito de ayudar a sus familias por medio de su trabajo en conjunto. Ellas se encuentran en el primer ciclo del programa d mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya y cuentan que les gustaría llegar al máximo nivel del programa. 
Una de las integrantes es la señora Alberta, quien nos comenta que con esfuerzo y mucho trabajo ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia, gracias a sus ventas. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropas de todo tipo, en lo cual le va muy bien, puesto que siempre tiene mucha variedad. 
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de verano, con lo cual abastecerse y tener más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group, “Maria Auxiliadora” is called that because its 15 members, from the city of Itá, wanted to get together so that they could help their families by working together.  They are in their first cycle of the “Entrepreneurial Women” program of the “Fundación Paraguaya” and they say that they want to reach the maximum level of the program.

Alberta is one of the members who tells us that she has managed to get her family ahead through her sales, and through much hard work and effort.  She sells all kinds of clothing and she is doing well because she always has a great variety.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy summer clothing so that she can stock up and have a greater variety to offer her customers.

loans.use: to stock up on summer clothing.

loans.name: Tesapeara Group

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Itá, 15 mujeres se unieron con el propósito de ayudar a  sus familias por medio del trabajo en conjunto de todas ellas. Se encuentran actualmente dentro del noveno ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación.
Una de las miembros es la señora Lorenza, quien se dedica a la costura, trabajo gracias al cual puede ayudar a su familia y darles lo minino para que no tengan que pasar por ningún tipo de necesidades. Ella comenta que siempre tiene mucho trabajo, por lo que tiene buenos ingresos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, botones, cierres y demás insumos necesarios para la confección.
texts.en:
Fifteen women from the city of Itá have gotten together to help their families by working together.  They’re in their ninth cycle within the foundation’s entrepreneurial women’s program.

Lorenza is one of the members.  She sews and, thanks to this work, is able to provide her family with what they need so that they do not lack any of the essentials.  She says that she always has plenty of work, so she has a good income.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy fabric, buttons, zippers, and other sewing supplies.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: La Amistad Group

texts.es:
El comité La Amistad” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de  Santaní. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, y también actividades en grupo, con lo cual podrán fomentar su compañerismo.
Una de las miembros es la señora Silvia, quien gracias a su esfuerzo y a su trabajo  ha podido salir adelante y aumentar sus ingresos, y de esa forma ayudar a su familia. Ella cuenta que se dedica a la cría y posterior venta de cerdos. Cuenta que es un trabajo muy sacrificado, lo cual requiere de mucho esfuerzo.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de cerdos pequeños y alimentos para estos, con lo cual podrá seguir creciendo y ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
The La Amistad (Friendship) Committee was formed by several neighbors in the city of Santaní. All the committee members develop independent businesses, as well as group activities which they will enable them to promote fellowship.

One of the members is Señora Silvia who, thanks to her effort and work, has been able to get ahead and increase her income and, in this way, help her family. Her business is raising and later selling pigs. This is a difficult job which requires a lot of effort. She is applying for the loan to purchase young pigs and pig feed. This will allow her to continue in increasing her income and helping her family.

loans.use: to purchase young pigs and pig feed.

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Group

texts.es:
El comité se ha formado con la gestión de una de las miembros quien contactó con sus vecinas y amigas para conformar el grupo en la zona. El comité se denomina “Virgen del Rosario”, están en el Noveno Ciclo y está constituido por 11  integrantes; es un grupo que se destaca  en el barrio por ser muy unido y responsable. Las integrantes poseen un gran espíritu emprendedor. 
Una de las miembros es la señor a Alicia, quien gracias a su trabajo y lucha diaria ha podido ayudar a su familia y sacarlos adelante. Ella tiene una peluquería en la que diariamente trabaja, atendiendo a mucha cantidad de clientes. Ella se define como una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora y muy luchadora. 
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de shampoo, enjuague, tintes, esmaltes para uñas y demás insumos para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
This group formed when one of the members contacted her neighbors and friends to form a group in the area.  The group is called "Virgen del Rosario" and they are in their ninth loan cycle.  There are 11 members of the group.  The group is known in their neighborhood for being very united and responsible.  The members have a strong entrepreneurial spirit.  

One of the members is Alicia, who thanks to her work and daily struggle has been able to help her family and get them ahead.  She has a beauty salon where she works every day, seeing a large number of customers.  She describes herself as a hardworking and enterprising fighter. 

She is asking for this loan to purchase shampoo, conditioner, hair dyes, nail polish, and other items to stock her business.

loans.use: to purchase shampoo, conditioner, hair dye, nail polish, and other items.

loans.name: San Isidro Group

texts.es:
San Isidro se llama el grupo formado por 11 mujeres D. Ciudad del Este, quienes se unieron con el objetivo D. ayudarse mutuamente, ya que ellas ven una gran ayuda en el grupo. Ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras, quienes desean poder ayudar a sus familias. 
Una D. ellas es la señora Estelvina, quien gracias a la venta D. joyas D. plata pueD. obtener los medios necesarios para ayudar a su familia y para cubrir los gastos que diariamente surgen en la casa. Ella comenta que tiene buena venta, ya que siempre tiene buena variedad. 
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. anillos, pulseras, cadenas y demás joyas con las cuales podrá tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The San Isidro group was formed by eleven women from Ciudad del Este who met with the objective of helping each other, since they saw how a group could be a great help.  They are hardworking and enterprising women who want to help their families.  

One of them is Estelvina, who helps her family and covers the daily household expenses with her sale of silver jewelry.  She says she has good sales because she always has a good variety.

She is asking for this loan to purchase rings, bracelets, necklaces, and other jewelry so that she will have more variety to offer her customers.

loans.use: to purchase rings, bracelets, necklaces, and other jewelry.

loans.name: Xenia

texts.ru:
Ксения замужем, у нее есть сын и дочка. Ксения занимается сельским хозяйством и выращивает разные ранние овощи в своем родном селе Приветное, Цюрупинского района. Каждый год на 25 сотках огорода она высаживает 4 000 кустов помидор, 3 000 огурцов, 4 тонны редиса. Фермерством она занимается уже 17 лет. В хозяйство на данный момент вложено 100 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль составляет 6 000 гривен. 

Ксения планирует использовать кредит КИВА в 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить удобрения, песок, навоз, а также семена для посева. Более того, она планирует использовать часть кредитных средств для того, чтобы построить новую теплицу, что поможет ей увеличить объемы выращиваемой продукции. 
Пометка: История на русском языке
texts.en:
Xenia is married and has a son and a daughter. Xenia is engaged in agriculture and grows different early vegetables in her native village of Privetnoye in the Tsyurupynsk area. Every year she plants 4,000 bushes of tomato, 3,000 cucumbers and four tons of radish in the 25 acres garden. She has been in the farming business for seventeen years. At this time she has 100,000 hryvna invested in her business. The net profit is 6,000 hryvna.

Xenia is planning to use the 20,000 hryvna Kiva loan to buy fertilizer, sand, manure, and seeds for planting. Moreover she plans to use a part of the loan funds to build a new greenhouse which will help her increase the volume of cultivated products.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, sand, manure and seeds for sowing

loans.name: Valentina

texts.ru:
Валентина – вдова, сама воспитала двух сыновей, которые уже взрослые и живут отдельно. Валентина много лет занимается выращиванием ранних овощей: уже на протяжении 13 лет она на 43 сотках садит рассаду в теплицах, а потом поле в 165 соток засаживает различными видами капусты и кукурузой. В хозяйство Валентина вложила 50 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль теперь составляет около 4 700 гривен в месяц. 

Кредит в 15 000 гривен необходим Валентине для того, чтобы закупить семена, пленку, агроволокно и дрова для своих теплиц. Благодаря улучшению условий в теплицах и своевременному ремонту каждой из них, Валентина сможет вырастить раннюю овощную продукцию высокого качества и быстро ее реализовать, получив при этом дополнительную прибыль.    
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Valentina is a widow; she brought up her two sons, who are now adults and live separately. Valentina has grown early-ripening vegetables for many years; for the past 13 years she has planted 43 acres of seedlings in a greenhouse and then plants different types of cabbage and corn in a field of 165 acres. Valentina has invested 50,000 hryvnia in her property. Her net income is now around 4,700 hryvnia a month. Valentina needs a loan of 15,000 hryvnia to purchase seeds, film, agricultural fiber, and firewood for her greenhouse. With improved conditions in the greenhouse and timely repair, Valentina will be able to grow high quality early-ripening vegetables and do so quickly, as a result, achieving a higher income.

loans.use: purchase seeds, film, agricultural fiber, and firewood for her greenhouse.

loans.name: Sergei

texts.ru:
Сергей женат, у него взрослые дочери. Сергей – из села Приветное. Он занимается выращиванием ранних сельхозкультур и каждый год высаживает 20 000 голов капусты, 15 000 перцев, 20 000 баклажанов, 10 000 кустов клубники, 1 000 головок лука, 30 000 кустов помидоров и засаживает 30 соток картофелем. Фермерством Сергей зарабатывает на жизнь вот уже 15 лет. В свое немалое хозяйство он вложил 50 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль составляет 4 400 гривен в месяц.   

Сергей хотел бы вложить сумму в 15 000 гривен в закупку семян и удобрений, а также проведение отопления, ремонт теплиц и перетяжку полиэтиленовой пленки в них. Сергею нравится заниматься любимым делом и в то же самое время зарабатывать при этом достаточно средств, чтобы содержать семью. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Sergei is married and has adult daughters.  He is from the Privetnoye village.  He is involved in growing early agricultural crops and plant 20 000 heads of cabbage, 15 000 peppers, 20 000 eggplants, 10 000 strawberry plants, 1 000 heads of onions, 30 000 tomato plants and uses 30 sotkas to plant potatoes every year.  Farming has been earning a living for Sergei for 15 years.  He invested 50 000 hryvnia into his large business.  His net profit amounts to 4 400 hryvnia per month.  Sergei wants to invest a sum of 15 000 hryvnia to purchase seeds and fertilizers, and also to install heating, repair greenhouses and re-installing the plastic in them.  Sergei likes to be involved in his favorite business and also likes to earn enough money from it to support his family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers, and also to install heating, repair greenhouses and re-installing the plastic in them

loans.name: Mujeres Generosas Group

texts.es:
Para la formación del presente comité inició gracias a la señora María. Ella contactó con sus vecinas y amigas para formar el comité en la zona. El grupo se denomina “Mujeres Generosas”. Están en el Quinto Ciclo, con 18  integrantes. Es un grupo que se destaca  en el barrio por ser muy unido, solidario y responsable. Todas ellas desean salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias. 
Una de las integrantes es la señora Ofelia, quien se dedica a la confección de todo tipo de prendas, comenta que siempre tiene muy buen trabajo, ya que siempre está llena de pedidos. Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y sacrificada, que lucha por el bien de su familia. 
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, botones, cierres y demás insumos para abastecer su local.
texts.en:
This lending group started thanks to Maria - she contacted her neighbors and friends to form a committee in their area. The group is named "Mujeres Generosas" and they are in their 15th cycle and have 18 members. This group stands out in their neighborhood because it is very united and responsible. They all want to get ahead and help their families.

One of the members is Ofelia, who makes all types of garments. She says that she always has plenty of work and is always full with orders. She says she is a hardworking woman who makes sacrifices to fight for her family's well-being. 

She asks for a loan to buy fabric, threads, buttons, zippers and other products to stock her workshop.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, zippers and other products.

loans.name: Galina

texts.ru:
Галина – вдова, у нее взрослые сыновья. Она занимается выращиванием ранних сельхозкультур в теплицах, а именно высаживает цветную капусту и помидоры для последующей реализации овощной продукции. Галина живет и занимается фермерством в селе Приветное, Цурюпинского района. Она занимается этим видом бизнеса уже 10 лет. В хозяйство вложено 40 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль составляет 3 800 гривен.  

Галина планирует использовать кредит в 7 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить семена, удобрения, пленку и отремонтировать теплицы. Ей нравится заниматься сельским хозяйством и выращивать ранние овощи, потому что это перспективный бизнес и к тому же он дает стабильную возможность содержать семью.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Galina is a widow and has adult sons.  She is involved in growing early agricultural crops in greenhouses and specifically, grows cauliflower and tomatoes until the next sales of vegetable produce.  Galina lives and works in the Privetnoye village in the Tsyurupynsk district.  She has been involved in this business for ten years.  Galina invested 40 000 hryvnia into her farm.  Her net profit is 3 800 hryvnia.  Galina plans to use the 7 000 hryvnia loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, plastic and to repair a greenhouse.  She likes to be involved in agriculture and grow early vegetables because this is a promising business, which provides for a stable opportunity to support her family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, plastic and to repair a greenhouse

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
El señor Pablo es de la ciudad de Pilar, es viudo, tiene 4 hijos, dos varones y dos mujeres todas ya mayor de edad e independientes cada uno con sus respectivas familias. 
El se dedica a la venta de productos medicinales, es distribuidor exclusivo en la zona de la planta medicinal llamada Moringa, lo fracciona y lo empaqueta él mismo. Es una persona muy activa, responsable y trabajadora con muy buenas referencias en el barrio. 
Solicita el crédito para la compra de más medicinas naturales, con las cuales podrá abastecerse y cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Pablo lives in the city of Pilar. He is a widower and has 4 children, 2 boys and 2 girls, all grown and living on their own with their families. 

He sells medicinal products and is the exclusive distributor in his region of the medicinal plant called Moringa. He breaks it up and packages it himself. He is a very active, responsible and hardworking person and has many good references in his neighborhood.

He asks for a loan to buy more natural medicines to stock his store and meet his customers' needs.

loans.use: to buy natural medicines for resale.

loans.name: Raisa

texts.ru:
Раиса замужем, у нее двое взрослых детей. Раиса живет в городе Мелитополе и занимается розничной торговлей мужской обувью и одеждой на привокзальном рынке № 3. Она занимается этим видом бизнеса уже 12 лет. На данный момент в товаре у нее 25 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль же составляет около 5 000 гривен. 

Раиса предприимчива и общительна, она всегда стремится уделить должное внимание каждому потенциальному покупателю. Раисе необходим кредит в 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы увеличить ассортимент сезонной одежды и обуви для продажи. На дополнительную прибыль она будет оказывать финансовую помощь дочери. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Raisa is married and has two adult daughters.  She lives in the city of Melitopol and is involved in retail sales of men's shoes and clothing at the train station market number 3.  Raisa has been in this business for 12 years.  Currently, she has 25 000 hryvnia invested in her merchandise.  Her net profit is about 5 000 hryvnia.  Raisa is entrepreneurial and communicative.  She always tries to pay the necessary attention to every potential customer.  Raisa needs a loan in the sum of 10 000 hryvnia to expand her selection of seasonal clothing and shoes for sale.  She will use the additional profit to provide financial assistance to her daughter.

loans.use: to expand her selection of seasonal clothing and shoes for sale

loans.name: Ligia

texts.es:
La señora Ligia  tiene 32 años de edad, está casado con el señor Wilson quien tiene 34 años de edad, ambos nacidos en la ciudad de Caacupé. Tienen 2 hijos  uno de 7 años y el otro de 3 años. 
La señora Ligia tiene un taller de Costura hace más de 5 años, allí fabrica y vende las remeras con  la imagen de la virgen de Caacupé. Ella comenta que tiene mucho trabajo en especial en estas fechas, ya que se acerca la fecha 8 de Diciembre (fecha Espiritual del País, fiestas de la virgen de Caacupé) porque recibe pedidos al por mayor  de sus clientes que en su mayoría son vendedores que cuentan con sus casillas en los alrededores de la basílica. 
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos y demás insumos para la elaboración de remeras, con las cuales podrá cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ligia, 32, is married to Wilson, 34. They are both from the city of Caacupé and have 2 children, one who is seven years old and one who is three.

For more than 5 years Ligia has had a sewing workshop where she makes and sells t-shirts with the image of the Virgin of Caacupé. She says that she is especially busy during this time of year because it's getting close to the 8th of December, a religious holiday for the festival of the Virgin de Caacupé. She receives bulk orders from her customers who are mostly merchants who have stalls around the basilica. 

She asks for a loan to buy fabric, thread and other products to make t-shirts to meet her customers' needs.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and other products.

loans.name: Nataliya

texts.ru:
Наталия – предприниматель из Виноградово. Она зарабатывает на жизнь тем, что торгует мужской обувью на центральном рынке города. Наталия замужем, у нее двое детей. Наталия занимается этой торговлей уже 12 лет. На данный момент у нее в товаре 35 000 гривен, чистый доход составляет 4 000 гривен. Наталия владеет двумя торговыми точками. 

Наталии необходим кредит в 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить новую зимнюю обувь, а именно приобрести 25 пар ботинок по сезону. Увеличив ассортимент товара, Наталия сможет увеличить и свой доход. В планах Наталии и дальше расширять торговлю, вкладывая силы, финансы и время в свое дело, которое она так любит. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Nataliya is an entrepreneur from Vinogradovo. She earns a living by selling men's shoes at the central market. Nataliya is married and has two children. Nataliya has been working in trade for twelve years. Right now, she has 35,000 hryvnia in inventory, and her net income is 4,000 hryvnia. Nataliya has two shops. 

Nataliya needs a loan of 10,000 hryvnia to buy new winter shoes, specifically to purchase 25 pairs of shoes for the season. By increasing the variety of goods she offers, Nataliya can increase her income. Nataliya plans to further expand her business by expending my energy, time, and money into her work, which she loves.

loans.use: to buy new winter shoes, specifically to purchase 25 pairs of shoes for the season

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
La Sra. Carmen, está casada con el Sr. Juan, son padres de un niño de seis años, viven en Ciudad del Este. 
Carmen es peluquera, tiene un salón de belleza a metros de su domicilio sobre la una avenida estratégica, está dedicada a esto hace siete años, cuenta con una clientela formada debido a que no posee competencia es esa zona, su marido, el señor Juan es empleado de una empresa de transporte como chófer. 
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de tintes, shampoo, enjuagues, tijeras, y demás insumos para abastecer a su negocio y cumplir con sus clientes. Agradece a la fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da, pues el crédito le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Carmen is married to Juan and they are the parents of a 6-year-old boy. They live in Ciudad del Este.

Carmen is a hairstylist and has a beauty salon just meters from her home on a strategic avenue. She has been doing this for seven years and has a regular clientele since she does not have any competition in the area. Her husband Juan is employed by a transportation business as a driver.

She is requesting the loan to buy dye, shampoo, conditioner, scissors, and other supplies with which to supply her business and satisfy her customers. She thanks the foundation for the opportunity they have given her as the loan will be of great assistance to her.

loans.use: to buy dye, shampoo, conditioner, scissors, and other supplies.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La Sra. Rosa tiene  37 años,  es casada, y tiene  un hijo, ellos viven en la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso, en su casa propia.
La Sra. Rosa tiene un copetín y una heladería, en su casa, se dedica a esto hace 5 años. Anteriormente tenía una despensa, pero luego cambio de rubro, y hoy en día tiene un negocio muy rentable. Nos comenta que le va muy bien y que ya tiene una clientela bien definida, lo cual le genera muy buenos ingresos, los cuales invierte en la casa y en su negocio.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, para abastecer su copetín, pues siempre tiene mucha demanda de ese producto. Agradece a la fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
Rosa is 37 years-old, married, and has a child. They live in Mariano Roque Alonso in their own home.

Rosa has a fast food counter and an ice cream parlor in her home. She has made a living doing this for five years. Before she had a small grocery store but later she changed areas and nowadays has a very profitable business. She tells us that she is doing well and that she has very regular customers. This generates good earnings for her which she then invests in her home and business.

She is requesting the loan to buy drinks with which to supply her fast food counter since there is a lot of demand for these products. She thanks the foundation for the opportunity they have given her.

loans.use: to buy drinks with which to supply her fast food counter.

loans.name: Alexei

texts.ru:
Алексей с семьей живет в Каменке, где большинство жителей занимаются фермерством и сельским хозяйством, за счет чего, в целом, живет весь регион. Алексей выращивает помидоры и редис. Он имеет три большие теплицы, садит 3 700 высокорослых помидор. Занимается этим бизнесом Алексей уже 22 года. В хозяйство он вложил около 100 000 гривен. Ежегодно затраты на семена и пленку составляют 35 000 гривен. 

Алексей планирует вложить 20 000 гривен в ремонт теплиц, установку отопления и закупку семян для высаживания в новом сезоне. Для Алексея очень актуально успеть расширить теплицу для рассады, чтобы иметь более качественную рассаду в следующем году. У Алексея подросли дети и для него, как отца, очень важно выучить и устроить их в этой жизни. Именно поэтому он стремится развивать свой бизнес, получая достойную прибыль, которую потом может вкладывать в личные нужды своей семьи. Дополнительно к выращиванию овощей Алексей также работает ответственным за электрохозяйство в фермерском хозяйстве. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Alexei and his family live in Kamenka, where of the inhabitants are farmers and agricultural workers. Alexei grows tomatoes and radishes. He has three large greenhouses where he grows 3700 tall tomatoes. Alexei has been in business for 22 years. He has about 100,000 hryvnia invested in his small farm.   Each year, he spends about 35,000 hryvnia on seeds and plastic sheeting.

Alexei plans to invest 20,000 hryvnia in repairing his greenhouses, installing heating, and buying seeds for planting next season. Alexei has enough time to expand his greenhouse to have better quality seedlings next year. Alexis has grown children, and for him as a father, it is important to teach them and to make sure they are set up in life. That is why he is trying to expand the business: if he gets a decent profit, then he can invest in the personal needs of his family. In addition to growing vegetables Alexei is also responsible for the electrical equipment on the farm.

loans.use: to repair his greenhouse, install heating, and buy seeds.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
La señora Cristina tiene 30 años de edad, está casada con el señor Octaciano de 38  años, quien es contratista de obra. La pareja tiene 2  hijos varones uno de 11 años y otro de 4 años.
La señora Cristina tiene una despensa y carnicería. El negocio empezó hace más de un año, que fue gracias a la ayuda de su marido, quien realiza todo tipo de trabajo de albañilería y plomería en la zona, con el pequeño capital  compraron un congelador y serrucho eléctrico, una vez que aumento la venta incrementaron la elaboración de chorizo casero que va resultando bastante bien. Necesitan capital  para la compra de carne en cantidad para aumentar la producción por la gran demanda que tiene.
Ella solicita la ayuda de la fundación para la compra de carnes en cantidad, para poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Cristina is 30 years-old and married to 38-year-old Octaciano who is a building contractor. The couple has two boys: one is 11 years-old and the other is 4 years-old.

Cristina has a small store and a butcher's shop. The business started more than one year ago thanks to her husband's help who did all the brickwork and plumbing in the area. With a small capital they bought a freezer and an electric handsaw. Once sales increased, they increased their homemade sausage production that has turned out very well. They need capital to buy a lot of meat to increase production due to the great demand there is.

She requests assistance from the foundation to buy a lot of meat in order to be able to satisfy her customers' demands.

loans.use: to buy a lot of meat in order to make homemade sausages.

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина замужем, у нее двое сыновей. Ирина живет в Каменке и занимается сельским хозяйством. Она выращивает ранние помидоры в тепличных условиях. Ирина имеет шесть больших теплиц, в которых она ежегодно высаживает 7 000 высокорослых помидор. Она занимается выращиванием овощей уже на протяжении 8 лет. В хозяйство вложила 150 000 гривен. Ежегодно на смену пленки и закупку семян уходит около 55 000 гривен. 

Ирине необходим кредит в 18 000 гривен для того, чтобы провести отопление в теплицах и натянуть второй слой полиэтиленовой пленки, чтобы уберечь будущий урожай от холодов. Ирина надеется на хороший урожай первых помидор в следующем году, так как первые помидоры всегда пользуются высоким спросом и продаются дороже. В осеннее и зимнее время Ирина не сидит, сложа руки, и к тому же торгует на рынке различной продукцией: цитрусовыми, яблоками, картошкой, морковкой и т.д. За продукцией всегда сами ездят туда, где можно сделать закупки подешевле. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Irina is married and she has two sons.  Irina lives in Kamenka and works in agriculture.  She grows early season tomatoes in greenhouses.  Irina owns six large greenhouses in which she plants 7,000 tall tomato plants each year.  She has been growing vegetables for 8 years.  She has invested 150,000 hryvna in her business.  Every year she spends close to 55, 000 hryvna to replace the protective cover and to buy seeds.
Irina is requesting a loan of 18,000 hryvna to provide heat to her greenhouses and protect future crops from the cold with a second layer of polyethylene cover.  Irina hopes that next year will bring a good crop of early tomatoes, because the demand for this type of tomatoes is always high and they can be sold at a good price.  In the fall and winter Irina also works very hard and sells various produce at the market: citrus fruits, apples, potatoes, carrots etc...  She always goes to places where she can purchase her produce at a low cost.

loans.use: To provide heat to her greenhouses and to protect future crops from the cold by covering them with a second layer of polyethylene cover.

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
La señora Mirian tiene 47 años, está casada con el señor Milciades de 39  años, el es empleado de una empresa de transporte, la pareja tiene 3 hijos, uno de 18 años, otro de 14 años y la más pequeña de 8 años, los dos mayores  estudian y ayudan a su madre en el negocio.
La señora  Miriam se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir, empezó hace mas de 5 años en su negocio, gracias a la ayuda de su marido quien es chapista de una empresa de transporte importante de la ciudad.
Ella comenta que con un poquito de capital empezó, y actualmente ya cuenta con local propio donde vende prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños. Desea mejorar su local comercial, y es por ello que solicita el crédito.
Desea comprar materiales para mejorar el local, ya que quiere ir creciendo y mejorar sus condiciones de trabajo.
texts.en:
Mirian is 47 years-old and married to 39-year-old Milciades who is employed by a transportation business. The couple has three children: one who is 18 years-old, another who is 14 years-old, and the youngest who is 8 years-old. The two eldest ones study and help their mother with the business.

Miriam makes a living selling garments. She began her business more than five years ago thanks to the help of her husband who is an automotive body repair worker for an important transportation business in the city.

She says that she began with little capital, and currently has her own store where she sells garments for women, men, and children. She wishes to improve her commercial store and for this reason is requesting a loan.

She would like to buy materials to improve the store since she wants to grow and better her work conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials to improve her business.

loans.name: Sergei

texts.ru:
Сергей женат, у него 8-летний сын и 12-летняя дочка. Вся семья живет в Каменке. Уже на протяжении 6 последних лет Сергей занимается выращиванием ранних помидоров и огурцов. Он имеет 6 больших теплиц. Ежегодно на семена и полиэтиленовую пленку тратит около 45 000 гривен. В хозяйство вложено в целом около 100 000 гривен. 

Сергей планирует использовать кредит в 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы установить отопление в теплицах. Более того, Сергей натягивает второй слой пленки, чтобы качественнее утеплить теплицы и иметь возможность вовремя высадить овощи в необходимом количестве и получить соответствующую прибыль. Сергей очень надеется получить дополнительную прибыль со своего сельскохозяйственного бизнеса, чтобы в следующем году вложить ее в ремонт своего дома, который уже давно нуждается в капитальном ремонте.   
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Sergei is married with an 8-year-old son and 12-year-old daughter. The whole family lives in Kamenka. For the last six years, Sergei has been engaged in the growing of early tomatoes and cucumbers. He has six large greenhouses. Annually, he spends about 45,000 hryvnia on seeds and plastic sheeting. There is around 100,000 hryvnia invested in the enterprise as a whole.

Sergei plans to use the loan of 20,000 hryvnia to install heating in the greenhouses. Moreover, Sergei is fastening a second layer of film to warm the greenhouses in a better manner to have the possibility in time to plant vegetables in sufficient quantities and to obtain corresponding profits. 

Sergei very much hopes to gain additional profit from his farming business in order next year to finish repairs on his home, which has long been in need of repair.

loans.use: install heating in greenhouses

loans.name: Ivan

texts.ru:
Иван – из Ужгорода, Западная Украина. Он торгует бытовой химией на одном из местных рынков, называемом «Краснодонцив». У Ивана есть свое торговое место. Товар неизменно пользуется спросом, есть своя клиентская база. В этом бизнесе Иван не так давно – всего один год. На данный момент его чистый доход составляет около 4 500 гривен в месяц. 

Иван планирует вложить кредит КИВА в 15 000 гривен в приобретение дополнительного количества товара для последующей его реализации. Он начал развиваться как частный предприниматель совсем недавно и поэтому строит далеко идущие бизнес планы, планируя расширение и постепенное увеличение товарооборота с течением времени. За счет увеличения дохода от бизнеса, Иван планирует улучшать бытовые условия своей семьи.   
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Ivan is from Uzhgorod in Western Ukraine. He sells household cleaners at the local market named "Krasnodoncev". Ivan has his own market stall where his goods are always in demand, as he has many regular clients. Ivan has been running his business only for a short time - a year. His current monthly profits are about 4500 griven a month.

Ivan is planning to use the 15,000 griven loan from KIVA to purchase additional goods for his store for resale. Since he has only recently started his business, there is a lot of room for expansion and Ivan is planning to develop his store and increase the assortment of goods he can offer to his clients. Using the profits form this loan, Ivan is hoping to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods for resale

loans.name: María Asunción Del Calvario (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal María Asunción  Del Calvario  se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la rica cultura histórica que encierran sus montañas.

Este es un grupo de 10 socias y 1 socio que decidieron unirse y formar este Banco Comunal que les sirve de mucho ya que con los créditos, ellos van mejorar sus pequeños negocios que tienen. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio, servicios, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Rosa Josefina, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 19, 17 y 12 años de edad el mayor estudia en universidad y los dos menores en  colegio, todos  aun vive con ella. Su esposo es comerciante.

Ella tiene una tienda de comestibles en su casa en la cual a pesar de que es pequeña vende de todo un poco, allí sus clientes encuentran desde arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes y muchos productos más, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos le ayudan cuando ella está ocupada, los productos los compra en el centro de Portoviejo aunque la mayoría de sus productos los recibe en su local. Tiene más de 4  años con su negocio, le va bien y espera seguir incrementando su negocio ahora con los créditos.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de priM. necesidad. Es su primer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y espera quedarse por mucho tiempo.

Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “María Asunción del Calvario” meets every 15 days in the parish of Picoaza in the city of Portoviejo. This place is known for being a commercial area, celebrating the traditional festivals of St. Peter and St. Paul, and having a rich historical culture influenced by the surrounding mountains.

This group consists of 10 women and 1 man who have decided to join together to form this Communal Bank, which has served them by providing loans. They plan to improve their small businesses. The members engage in different business activities such as retail, services, selling food, and other trades.

In this place, one can meet Sra. Rosa Josefina. She is 37 years old, married, and has three children (ages 19, 17, and 12). Her oldest child is studying at the university and two younger ones are in high school. All of them live with her. Her husband is a merchant.

Rosa has a food store in her home. Even though her business is small, she sells a little bit of everything. Her customers can find rice, sugar, oil, detegerents, and many other products. She works every day from 6am to 8pm, and sometimes much later. Her children help whenever she is busy. Rosa buys her products in central Portoviejo and most of the items are delivered to her store. She has been in business for more than four years. She is doing well and hopes to continue growing her business now that she has access to the loans.

This loan will be used to acquire more inventory for her store. Rosa plans to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, sausages, and other products that are basic necessities. This is her first loan cycle with the Communal Bank and she hopes to stay with the group for a long time. Her goals are to move forward in her business and to grow her store each day.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, sausages, and other products.

loans.name: Nancy Elizabeth

texts.es:
La Señorita. Nancy es socia del banco comunal Espori Mi Bankito, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad tiene una gran riqueza natural, colonia y cultural, es conocida como la Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, es desde 1999 patrimonio cultural de la humanidad, su gente y sus tradiciones la hacen una ciudad cálida.

La Señorita. Nancy tiene 21 años de edad, es soltera y vive con su mamá quien labora en varias actividades, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
Ella es estudiante en una Universidad de la ciudad y se encuentra en el séptimo ciclo de Ingeniería en Turismo, en sus tiempos libres labora conjuntamente con su mamá en la atención de un bar.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 3 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de materiales de construcción ya que están construyendo su casa. 

Sus metas son terminar de construir su casa y llegar a ser profesional.
texts.en:
Nancy is a member of Espori Mi Bankito Communal Bank.  She lives in the city of Cuenca, which has great natural, colonial, and cultural richness.  It is known as Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, and since 1999 has been a Cultural Patrimony of Humanity.  The people and their traditions make it a warm city.

Nancy is 21 years old and single.  She lives with her mother, who works various jobs.  They do not have their own house, so they rent.

She is a university student in the city and she is in her seventh semester of tourism engineering.  In her spare time she works with her mother taking care of a bar.

She has been a member of the communal bank for three years, and she will invest her new loan in buying construction materials because they are building their house.

Her goals are to finish building her house and to become a professional.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Rosa Melania

texts.es:
La Señora Rosa es socia del banco comunal Espori Mi Bankito, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad tiene una gran riqueza natural, colonia y cultural, es conocida como la Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, es desde 1999 patrimonio cultural de la humanidad, su gente y sus tradiciones la hacen una ciudad cálida.

Doña Rosa tiene 50 años, es divorciada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 31, 21 y 16 años de edad, su primer hijo trabaja y ayuda económicamente, su segunda hija estudia en la universidad y su ultima hija en el colegio. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
La Señora. Rosa tiene un bar, actividad que la desempeña hace dos años, trabaja de lunes a sábados todo el día. También labora en la preparación de bufetes para todo tipo de fiestas sociales.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 5 años y su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de materiales de construcción para la construcción de su casa.
 
Su meta es terminar su casa.
texts.en:
Señora Rosa is a member of the community bank "Espori Mi Bankito." She lives in the city of Cuenca. This city has a great natural, colonial, and cultural richness. It is knows as the Santa Ana of the Four Rivers. Since 1999 it has been a world heritage site, and its traditions make it a warm city.

Doña Rosa is 50 years old. She is divorced and has three children ages 31, 21, and 16. Her oldest son works and helps her economically. Her second child, a daughter, studies at the university, and her youngest daughter is in high school. She doesn't have her own home, so she rents.

Señora Rosa has a bar, a business that she began two years ago. She works all day from Monday to Saturday. She also prepares refreshments for all types of social occasions.

She has been a member of her community bank for five years, and she is going to invest her loan in the purchase of construction materials for the construction of her house. 

Her goal is to finish her house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish, shrimp, lobsters, oysters, etc.

loans.name: Recto

texts.en:
Recto 37 years old. For the past six years, he has been a farmer and his farming business is a great help to provide for the needs of his wife and children. Recto works hard and cares about his business and therefore it is necessary to provide for his farm's needs. 

Recto is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan to buy corn seed, fertilizer, and pesticide. Hopefully, his improved inputs will result in better crops and he will be able to successfully grant his wish of providing for his children's education and improving his family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, fertilizer, and pesticide

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
Antonio is 58 years old and married with four children. He supports his family by farming. He patiently cultivates their farm, planting corn seeds in order to provide for his family’s needs. With his fellow farmers who help him to operate his business, he is slowly reaching his desired income.

Antonio's goal of improving his family's standard of living is almost within reach. However, because of the high prices of food and other necessities, he cannot save enough for the business, an emergency fund, and his youngest child's school fees. Therefore, he is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 15,000 from Alalay sa Kaunlaran, Inc. He will use the loan to purchase farm inputs such as corn seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides. He says that this loan will be a great help to him for improving his business, which will possibly become a great source of income in the future.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.en:
Gregorio is 59 years old and blessed with nine children. He wants his children to pursue their studies so they can earn their degrees and become professionals someday. But nowadays, it is difficult for him to finance their education due to the high cost of commodities, school fees, and transportation. To lessen his burden, his four children have volunteered to stop attending school so they can help him with his business.

Gregorio wants to improve his farming business in order to provide a better standard of living and earn enough income to support the education of all of his children. Due to financial constraints, he is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 15,000 to buy corn seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides to improve his crops. He believes that through patience and hard work they will make the business practical and profitable in the future.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides to improve his crop.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.en:
Salvador is a farmer who lives a simple life in his community. He is 48 years old, married, and blessed with three children. He is an industrious husband who has operated a farming business for almost 10 years. He also raises chicken and goats as an additional source of income. Through these activities, Salvador is able to provide for the needs of his family.

Due to the high costs of food, allowances, and other necessities, he has not been able to save for his farming business. Salvador is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 15,000 to purchase corn seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides. To be productive and earn more profits, he needs to work hard and strive to improve his business. Then he can provide a better future for his children.

loans.use: to purchase corn seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.en:
Jesus is 40 years old and the father of five children. To support his family, he has a farming business. He earns money for buying commodities, for the allowances of his children, and for daily necessities. Due to the high cost of these needs, his business suffers. He cannot afford to buy farm supplies, and consequently, he’s in need of financial assistance. For this reason, he is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy seed corn, pesticides, and fertilizers.

He will use this loan to make progress in his business. He said that no one will benefit from his patience and hard work except for his family.

loans.use: to buy seed corn, pesticides, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Nyamjav

texts.en: Nyamjav is 58 years-old and lives with his wife in a ge r(Mongolian yurt) in Govisumber province, Mongolia. His wife is a clerk. He started his goldsmith business in 2007 by renting a space in the market. His business was slow and he decided to move to another market. His business is better than ever and he can't seem to keep up with the customers due to his old equipment. He is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT in order to buy new equipment and some raw materials. He is a hardworking and diligent man who says "now that my children are grown and independent, it's time to concentrate on my business".

loans.use: to buy new equipment and some raw materials.

loans.name: Jefferson

texts.en:
Jefferson is 27 years old, not married, and yet very devoted to his farming business. He is a college graduate but has not been able to find a better job because of the employment crisis in this country. For this reason, Jefferson is dedicated full-time to operating his farming business. He works hard and patiently cares for his business in order to get better crop yields.

To provide his parents with a good quality of life and to lift them out of poverty, he is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to continue financing his business. This loan would be used to purchase seed corn and fertilizer for his corn field. He hopes for further growth and improvement of his business, and to increase his yield by the next harvesting season.

loans.use: to buy seed corn and fertilizer for his corn field.

loans.name: Oyun

texts.en: Oyun is 51 years-old and lives with her son, daughter-in-law and granddaughter in a ger (mongolian yurt) in Uvurhangai province, Mongolia. Her daughter-in-law helps with her business, her son is a college student and her granddaughter goes to kindergarden. She started her grocery retailing business in 2008 by renting a counter in the market. Her income is not enough to pay her son's college fee. Therefore, she decided to build a small shop with sandwich panels, therefore she will save a serious amount of money to pay her son's college fee and it will be more convenient to run her business. She is a sharp and hardworking woman who is requesting 1,500,000 MNT to buy sandwich panels.

loans.use: to buy sandwich panels to build a small shop.

loans.name: Men

texts.en:
Mrs. Men is 61 years old and the mother of six children. She lives in Kompong Speu province, Cambodia. To earn a living, she has spent most of her life cultivating rice and some kinds of vegetables together with her husband. Typically, she is able to earn an average of $1.00 per day. When her vegetable crops become mature, one of her daughters takes them to sell in a local market for a profitable price. 

Mrs. Men would like to borrow some funds from Kiva to build a nice kitchen and a toilet to improve her living conditions. As usual, she cooks her food in her yard outside the room and it’s not comfortable at all. In the future, she intends to buy a pumping machine for the process of growing her vegetable crops and to expand her farming business.

loans.use: to build a nice kitchen and a toilet to improve her living conditions.

loans.name: Johnny

texts.en:
Johnny is 34 years old and engages in farming as a source of income. He has a responsibility to support his wife and one child, so he is being patient, working in the field every day to provide for their needs. He has been doing this for six years and has experienced different setbacks in the course of making progress.

He has lost earnings because of a typhoon, and had his plants destroyed by pests. But in spite of these failures, he strives harder to continue his business. He is asking for assistance through a loan of PHP 15,000 from Alalay sa kaunlaran Inc. This will be used to buy seed corn, fertilizer, and pesticides to avoid disastrous infestations of pests.

loans.use: to buy seed corn, fertilizer, and pesticides to avoid disastrous infestations of pests.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.en:
Rafael is 56 years old and was raised by his parents in the farming business. He was not able to finish his studies because of his underprivileged life, so he made a promise to himself that his children will not be like him. Right now, he is already blessed with five children and three of them are currently studying.

He provides their needs through his farming business. But due to high cost of school equipments, foods, and allowances, his family suffers from financial constraint. He cannot save for his farming business. To continue their livelihood, Rafael is asking for a loan in the amount of 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy farm inputs such as corn seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides, and to pay for labor costs in operating his business.  

With this loan amount and his hard work, he will be able to save for the future of his family and send his children to school until they enter their desired career.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs such as corn seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides, and to pay for labor costs in operating his business.

loans.name: Rocky

texts.en:
Rocky is 27 years old and has a farming business as a source of income. He is married and blessed with one child. He is making his own way to provide for the needs of his family. However, there are certain problems that he cannot avoid such as high cost of purchasing foods and farm inputs that he needs to continue his business. He suffers financial constraint.

For this reason, Rocky is asking for a loan amount of 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy corn seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides used in his business. Through his loan, patience, hard work, and love to his family, he will be able to continue his business and improve more to earn high income. He wants to save for the growth of his family as well as for their education.

loans.use: To buy corn seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides used in his business.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en:
Reynaldo believes that he will improve the general living conditions for his family and give them a better life through his hard work and patience. At the age of 39, he already has three children. He wants to educate all his children so that they will not have an occupation similar to his; instead they will have a better job some day. 

Due to the high cost of school equipments, foods, and allowances, he was not able to save for the operation of his business. For this reason, he needs to ask for a loan amount of 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to purchase farm inputs such as corn seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides. He wants to earn more income to satisfy his family's needs and support the education of his children. He believes that when he works and strives harder, he will develop his business and absolutely improve their general living.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs such as corn seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Oyunchimeg

texts.en: Oyunchimeg is 22 years old and lives with her husband and son in a ger (Mongolian yurt) in Uvurhangai province, Mongolia. Her husband works in a factory and her son goes to kindergarden. She started her hairdressing business in 2008 by renting a space in market. Her business income has been pretty much the same since she started her business therefore, she decided to sell cosmetics. She thinks that it will attract a lot of customers and retailing cosmetics is very profitable therefore, she is requesting 700,000 MNT to buy supplies. She is a sharp and hardworking woman who says "Now I have a son to support therefore, I need to increase my income."

loans.use: To buy cosmetics supplies for her hairdressing business

loans.name: Purevdulam

texts.en: Purevdulam is 44 years old and lives with her husband and son in her own apartment in Uvurhangai province, Mongolia. Her husband is a chauffeur and her son is a school student. She started her business in 1999 by renting a counter in market. Many new markets have opened in town therefore, she decided to build her own shop made with sandwich panels (a type of construction material). She has already planned where to build a shop, and it is located in a much more crowded place. She is requesting 3,000,000 MNT to buy sandwich panels. She is a sharp and hardworking woman who says, "My son will join college next year therefore, I need to act aggressive to increase my income."

loans.use: To buy sandwich panels to build a grocery store

loans.name: Nora

texts.en: Nora, a 39-year-old widowed mother of two children, lives in Lutao, Panaon, Misamis Occidental where for the past seven years she has had a business selling nutritious snacks.
